headline: Omuwanika Waggwa Nsibirwa ayanjudde alipoota ku nsimbi ezava mu Luwalo eziwera akawumbi kalamba
text: Minisita w’ebyenfuna era Omuwanika w’ eggwanika lya Buganda, Owek. Robert Waggwa Nsibirwa ategeezezza nti abantu ba Buganda bongedde okujjumbira enteekateeka z’okulaakulanya Obuganda nga bawaayo ensimbi mu nteekateeka y’Oluwalo okusobola okuwagira enteekateeka za Beene. Alipoota omuwanika agiweeredde mu Bulange e Mmengo ku Lwokubiri mu lukung’aana lwa bannamawulire olwetabiddwamu ne minisita omubeezi owa gavumenti ez’ ebitundu Joseph Kawuki. Owek. Waggwa Nsibirwa ategeezezza nti mu luwalo lw’omwaka 2022 basobola okukungaanya ensimbi eziwera akawumbi kamu n’emitwalo 90 wansi w’enteekateeka y’ Oluwalo lwaffe nga zino zakungaanyizibwa nezisengekebwa okusinziira ku masaza n’eggombolola eziri mu Buganda n’ebweru waayo. Okusinziira ku Owek. Waggwa Nsibirwa ensimbi zino zisaasanyiziddwa ku bintu ebyenjawulo mu bwakabaka era Katikkiro Mayiga bweyali aggalawo Oluwalo lw’ omwaka 2022 yalagira eggwanika okufulumya ensaasaanya y’ensimbi zino okusobola okunyweza ennyingo y’ obwerufu. Omuwanika agamba nti ensimbi zino zizze zirinnya mu myaka ag’enjawulo nga mu 2017 bakung’aanya obukadde 202, mu 2018 nebafuna obukade 414, 2019 obukadde 515, 2020 obukadde 352,2021 obukadde 654ne 2022 akawumbi kalamba n’emitwalo 90.  Owek. Nsibirwa annyonnyodde nti Obukadde 60 bwawagira okulwanyisa mukenenya mu bwakabaka, ate obukadde 100 nebusibwa ku mulimu gw’ okuzzaawo Muzibwazaalampanga. Ekitongole kya Beene ekya Kabaka Education Fund bakiteekamu obukadde 76 ate Emmwaanyi Terimba nebagiwa obukadde 283 n’emitwalo 72. Ono agasseeko nti omulimu gw’okuwa abantu amazzi amayonjo nga bayita mukusima enzizi baziteekako obukadde 39 nga zino zaava mu ssaza lya Rocky Mountains mu Amerika. Minisita Nsibirwa agamba nti emirimu gy’ Embuga bagiteekako obukadde 71 nemitwalo 41 mu 7000m so nga okusembeza abagenyi ba Nnyinimu mu Bulange kwatwala obukadde 210 n’emitwalo 56. Ensimbi obukadde 93 n’emitwalo 45 mu lukumi zazzibwaayo ku Ggombolola ate amasaza ga Beene omuli Ankole, Mbale, Busia Malaba Tororo ne Busoga gaweebwa obukadde 13 emitwalo 57 mu lukumi.. Owek. Waggwa agamba nti waliwo obubonero bungi obulaga nti abantu ba beene bongedde okusiima enteekateeka eno mu bikolwa kubanga ebisinga bibaganyula buteerevu nga mu nkola eno Obwakabaka bwakasima enzizi 671. Ye Minisita omubeezi owa Gavumenti ez’ ebitundu, Owek. Joseph Kawuki ategezezza nti oluwalo luyambye okuzimba obukulembeze n’okukola ennyo mu bantu ba Kabaka kubanga ku mitendera gyonna abantu balwetabamu butereevu.

headline: KCCA egenda kubonereza bannyini bizimbe abakkirizza abatembeeyi ku mbalaza zabwe
text: Ekitongole kya Kampala Capital City Authority (KCCA)kifulumizza ebiragiro ebikulu musanvu eri bannanyini bizimbe mu Kampala omuli okubisiiga, okubigobako abatembeeyi abakolera ku bbalaza zaabyo. Okusobola okulaba nti bino bituukirira, waliwo engassi eziteekeddwawo omuli n’okuggala ebizimbe bino singa binaasangibwa nga bigaanye okugondera ensonga zino. Ebiragiro bino bifulumiziddwa omubaka wa Pulezidenti mu Kampala, Hudu Hussein leero ku Lwokubiri ku Media Centre mu Kampala. Okusinziira ku Hudu, bino byonna bigendereddwamu okukyusa endabika y’ekibuga Kampala kituukane ku mutindo gw’ebibuga ebirala mu nsi yonna nga Dubai. Mu biragiro bino, Amaduuka, Akeedi, bannyini bizimbe n’abavunaanyizibwa ku bizimbe awamu ne bannyini ttaka balina obuvunaanyizibwa okugoba abatembeeyi ababikolerako nga bakolagana ne poliisi awamu ne KCCA. Hussein agasseeko nti batandise dda okukola ku ky’okuggya abaana abasabiriza ku nguudo era bali mu nteeseganya ku kye balina okukolera ababuulira enjiri ku nguudo kuba abasinga abantu bazze babeemulugunyaako enfunda eziwera. Mu birala, KCCA eyagala bannyini bizimbe bayambeko okugoba enzikiza ku bizimbe n’enguudo za Kampala nga bateeka amataala ne kkamera z’ekika kya CCTV ku bizimbe byabwe okusobola okunyweza eby’okwerinda. Hudu agamba nti amataala bano balina okugateeko nga akabonero ak’okuddiza eri ekibuga ku nsimbi obuwanana ze bayoola okuva mu bapangisa ebizimbe bino era n’alabula ne bannyini bizimbe abatafaayo kubiddaabiriza. Ono alaze ebimu ku bizimbe ebiri mu mbeera embi nga ku bino kuliko; Cham Towers, MTN Towers ne NSSF Towers by’agamba nti byetaagako langi empya bituukane n’omutindo. Mu ngeri yeemu ebizimbe byonna birina okuteekebwako amannya ne nnamba mu bwangu ddala. Ku nsonga ya Boodabooda, Hudu annyonnyodde nti bali mu kwebuuza okulaba engeri gye basobola okubawa obukooti obuliko ennamba z’ekika kya QR era bawandiisibwe okusinziira ku ssiteegi zaabwe era bano bakutendekebwa era abo bokka abanaatuukiriza ebisaanyizo be bagenda okukkiriza okukolera mu Kampala. KCCA yaakwongera okusimba omuddo n’emiti mu kibuga wakati mu nteekateeka y’okulabang’ekibuga kyongera okufaanana obulungi.

headline: Ab’e Bukomansimbi balabuddwa ku ssente z’emyoga, tujja kubasiba
text: Bukomansimbi – Buddu Abantu ba Kabaka abawangaalira mu disitulikiti y’e Bukomansimbi balabuddwa ku nsimbi z’emyoga singa banaazikozesa obubi nti abamu baakufundikira nga bali mu makomera kuba ensimbi zino si zaakulya wabula okwekulaakulanya. Okulabula kuno kukoleddwa akulira ekitongole  kya Micro-Finance Support Centre mu bbendobendo ly’e Masaka,  Katobe Wilfreds,  bw’abadde abangula abatuuze ba Bukomansimbi North ne South ku nteekateeka eno ku kitebe kya disitulikiti. Katobe agambye nti waliwo abantu abategese SACCO ez’ebicupuli basobole okuganyulwa mu nsimbi zino naye balina okukimanya nti babeetegekedde. Enteekateeka eno mu kitundu kya Bukomansimbi North ne South ezingiramu SACCO 36 era nga bano babanguddwa ku nkozesa y’ensimbi zino era ne baweebwa amabaluwa. Bano oluvannyuma lw’okutendekebwa bati balinze kuganyulwa mu nsimbi ezisoba mu kawumbi akalamba  (1.12billon) ezaatuuse edda ku akawunta zaabwe basobole okwekulaakulanya. Ye omukwanaganya w’enteekateeka y’emyoga mu mu bitundu by’e Masaka, Gonzaga Muteesaasira,  yeebazizza Pulezidenti Museveni olw’enteekateeka eno  ng’agamba nti abantu bangi basula ng’emitima gibeewanise (ku bunkenke)  nga Bbanka n’abawola embaata babatwalako ebintu byabwe,  naye kati omuntu wa wansi ajja kusobola okweggya mu bwavu. Mu ngeri y’emu omubaka wa Pulezidenti e Bukomansimbi, Teopisita Lule Ssenkungu,  ategeezezza nti bakoze okunoonyereza era ne bazuula nti  SACCO eziweereddwa amabaluwa z’entuufu n’asaba abantu okwebuuza  ku bantu ababasingako, okwewala  okukola ensobi. Bo abantu ab’enjawulo  ababanguddwa basiimye gavumenti ku nteekateeka eno ne basuubiza okugikozesa obulungi.

headline: Olukiiko lwa Buganda luyisizza ebiteeso 6 –  lwagala endagaano y’EmmwAanyi eya kampuni ya Vinci esazibwemu
text: Olukiiko lwa Buganda luyisizza ebiteeso mukaaga mu lutuula olw’okusatu olw’omwaka ogwa 29,nerusemba endagaano yeyakolebwa wakati wa gavumenti ne kampuni ya Vinci Coffee Co. Ltd esazibwemu mu bwangu. Mu lukiiko luno olubadde lukubirizibwa Sipiika Patrick Luwaga Mugumbule luyisizza ebiteeso lweyamidde ku ndagaano eno abakiise nebakuba ebituli ku Musigansimbi ono eyaleeteddwa okulaakulanya emmwanyi kyokka nga talina ssente, nebalabula gavumenti ku ndagaano ekika kino. Abakiise bakkaanyiza awatali kwekutulamu endagaano eno esazibwemu kuba terina kalungi kegenda kuleeta eri abalimi b’emmwaanyi mu Uganda ne Buganda. Olukiiko lusembye Katikkiro okulondoola ensonga y’okuteekawo ttabamiruka w’abalimi b’emmwanyi bonna mu Uganda,n’ekigendererwa eky’okutema empenda ez’okuyamba bannayuganda okusigala mu bulimi n’obusuubuzi bw’emmwaanyi. Mu ngeri yeemu Olukiiko luvumiridde abantu abatulugunya abavubi, abalunnyanja, nabalunzi b’ebyenyanja n’ekigendererwa ky’okwagala okubagoba mu nnyanja n’okubagoba mu mulimu gw’okulunda ebyenyanja nelusaba kino kibeereko ekkomo. Olukiiko lusembye Obwakabaka okuteekawo enkola enayamba okulambika abantu ku nsonga y’ennyimbe mu Buganda awamu n’okubabangula ku by’obusika, n’ebiteeso ebirala okusobola okutaasa obuwangwa n’ennono za Buganda. Olukiiko lusembye nti mu ngeri eyenjawulo luseewo amaanyi mu kugunjula n’okutendeka omwana ow’obulenzi mu Buganda.

headline: Omugagga Abid Alam asindikiddwa mu kkomera e Kitalya
text: Abid Alam mu galubindi [ekifananyi kya Nilepost]  Omugagga Abid Alam ekawungeezi kaleero asindikiddwa mu kkomera e Kitalya okutuuka nga May 8 lwanadda mu kkooti okwewozaako. Ono  eyakwatibwa sabbiiti ewedde akakiiko akakola kukulwanyisa enguzi mu  maka g’obwapulezidenti nga kakulirwa munnamagye, Col. Edith Nakalema. Alam n’abasirikale ba poliisi bana eb’ekitundu ky’e Wamala bavunaanibwa okutulugunya abatuuze be Kassanda ng’abaagala babagobe kuttaka lyabwe. Abasirikale kuliko  akulira okunonyereza ku buzzi bw’emisango mu kitundu ky’e Wamala, Wilbert Osin Wanyama,akulira poliisi y’e Kassanda  Daniel Owellano, wamu n’akulira okunonyereza mu kitundu ky’ekimu   Peter Beitera ssako n’akulira okunonyereza ku poliisi y’e Kassanda  Sgt. Azale.  Kigambibwa bano bayambako Alam okumuwa fayiro ekwata kuttaka erikayanirwa e Kassanda kweyasinziira n’agoba abatuuze ku ttaka wamu n’okubatulugunya. Abataano bano bonna beeganye emisango gino.

headline: Oweek. Kaawaase agamba Obwavu obuli mu Buganda tebusosola
text: Oweek. Kaawaase ne Boodi ya BUCADEF empya  Bulange Omumyuka Asooka owa Katikkiro Prof. Twaha Kaawaase Kigongo, ategeezezza nti obwavu obuluma abantu mu Buganda tebusosola mu ddiini, langi  wadde ebibiina by’ebyobufuzi. Okwogera bino Kaawaasa abadde atongozza boodi y’ekitongole ki ‘Buganda Culture and Development Foundation (BUCADEF)’ empya ku Lwokubiri e . “Bwewetoloola Buganda eno olaba abantu baffe nga obwavu buyitirivu, endwadde tezaawula, obutamanya nabwo tebwawula,” Kaawaase bweyagambye. Ono alaze emiramwa okwazimbira ekitongole ki BUCADEF omuli; okukuuma eby’obuwangwa n’ennono, okusitula embeera z’abantu ba Buganda wamu n’okubeera n’ensimbi. Oweek.  Kaawaase anyonyodde nga ekitongole kino bwekiri ekisaale mu kutumbula embeera z’abantu mu bulamu obwa bulijjo era nabasaba okutegeera amasiga Obwakabaka kwebuyimiridde. “Tosobola kubeera ku boodi ya BUCADEF okugiddukanya nga totogedde bwakabaka kyeki kubanga ojja kulemwa okutegeera ebigendererwa bya BUCADEF. Olina okutegeera amasiga kwetuyimiridde, ” Oweek. Kaawaase bwagasseeko. Eng. Ishak Lukenge, Dr. Gorette Nabanoga n’ Oweek. Kaawaase Ate ye Minisita Hajjati Mariam Mayanja Nkalubo yeebazizza boodi enkadde olw’okukola omulimu ogwagiweebwa era nasuubizza nga minisitule ye bwegenda okubayamba okulaba nga omulimu gwanguwa. Boodi empyaekulirwa Engineer Ishak Lukenge,  Dr. Gorette Nabanoga amyuka Ssentebe,  abalala kuliko; Mw. Tyaba Bazilio, Prof. Yefusa Kitungulu Zaake, Mw. Luyimbazi Nalukoola, Dr. Emma Naluyima,  ne Mw. Saul Kaye Ssentebe omuggya Ishak Lukenge, yeebazizza Ssaabasajja Kabaka okusiima nabalonda okukulembera boodi eno. Ono ategeezezza nti BUCADEF gwe mutima gwa Buganda kubanga yesuubirwa okukyusa obulamu bwa bantu ba Buganda era nawera okutuukiriza obuvunaanyizibwa obwamuwereddwa.

headline: Ababaka baagala omwenge gutandike okutundibwa ssaawa 6 ez’emisana, bw’obigaana osibwa myaka 10
text: Palamenti ekkiriza omubala omukyala owa disitulikiti ye Tororo Sarah Opendi atandike okubaga ku tteeka erigaana amabaala okutunda omwenge nga ssaawa 6 ez’emisana tezinawera awamu n’obutasukka ssaawa 12 ez’okumakya nga bakyagutunda. Ebbago lino lituumiddwa ‘ Alcoholic Drinks Control Bill 2022,’ nga singa linafuuka etteeka, omuntu yenna anaasangibwa nga atunda omwenge wansi w’essaawa 6 ez’omutuntu oba 12 ez’okumakya ajja kusibwa emyaka 10 oba okuwa engasi ya bukadde 20 oba byombi. “Omuntu takkirizibwe kutunda wansi wa ssaawa 6 ez’okumakya wadde okugutunda okusukka ssaawa 12 ez’okumakya. Omuntu anaasangibwa nga amenye etteeka lino ajja kuba azizza omusango era asibwe emyaka 10 oba asasule obukadde 20 oba byombi,” Ebbago bwerisoma. Opendi bweyabadde asaba olukusa okugenda okuteekaka ebbago lino yagambye nti waliwo obwetaavu okukoma ku budde abantu bwebanyweramu omwenge era kiyambe okukendeeza ebbula bikolwa. Okusinziira ku Opendi endwadde ezimu eziriwo kati ziva ku mwenge ogw’obulabe so nga n’engeri abantu gyebanywamu omwenge ereetedde obutabanguko mu maka okweyongera. Mu tteeka lino. tekkirizibwa kuguza musirikale oba mujaasi ali mu byambalo omwenge oba okugutundira mu mmotoka wadde okuguguza abaaana abali wansi w’emyaka 18 wadde okutunda omwenge gw’obuveera. Opendi agamba nti wadde wabaddewo amateeka nga ‘The Enguli (Manufacture and Licensing) Act, the Portable Spirits Act cap.97 ne Liquor Act’ gano gakolebwa mabega nnyo nga kati ebiseera bikyuuse nga omwenge omupya oguli ku katale tegwogerwako. Kinajjukirwa nti alipoota y’ ekitongole ky’ensi yonna eky’obulamu ki World Health Organisation (WHO) eya 2018 yalaga nti Uganda yeemu ku nsi ezisinga okunywa omwenge mu Africa.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga asabye gavumenti ewagire bannansi abongera omutindo ku Mmwaanyi nga tenanoonya baggwira
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga asabye gavumenti eveeyo eyambeko ku bannayuganda abagatta omutindo ku kirime ky’ emmwaanyi nga tenanoonya baggwira kubakwasizaako. Okusaba kuno Owek. Mayiga akukoledde Mbiriizi e Lwengo mu Buddu ku Lwokusatu bw’abadde alambula abalimi b’emmwaanyi mu nteekateeka y’ Emmwaanyi Terimba egendereddwamu okugoba obwavu mu bantu ba Kabaka. “Abali ku ggwe mmwaanyi abazongeddeko omutindo nga bannayuganda gavumenti beeba ekwatizaako, abagwira ebaviireko ddala. Bagamba nti bw’oyongerako omutindo oyongera okufuna ssente ate nga kituufu, bwaba Nabatanzi asiika kkaawa ate lwaki nnoonya Allan Smith,” Katikkiro Mayiga bw’abuuzizza. Owek. Mayiga annyonnyodde nti omulimu gw’emmwaanyi guliisa abantu bangi omuli abazirima, abazitunda kuno n’ebweru awamu nabo abazisunsula bwatyo nalaga obwetegefu okwaniriza ensonga zonna ezitereeza omulimu guno omuli n’okusitula omutindo singa zisosoowaza bannansi okusinga. Owek. Charles Peter Mayiga bw’atuuse mu ggombolola ya Mituba VII e Kyenvuunikidde mu nnimiro ya Yosum Muyambi omunyarwanda wa Kabaka ng’ono alina yiika ezisoba mu 35 mu bitundu ebyenjawulo, abaayo abasabye emmwanyi okugiwa obudde nga omulimu gwonna omulala okusobola ogufunamu. Ono era abasabye abazifunyeemu okuyambako abalala kuba tebasobola kubeera bulungi nga balirwana babwe bali bubi bwatyo nabasaba bagabane amagezi n’endokwa kibayambe okulaakulanira awamu olwo Buganda edde ku ntikko. Ye Minisita omubeezi ow’Ebyobulimi n’Obulunzi Owek. Hajji Amis Kakomo, yebazizza Mukuumaddamula olwa kawefube n’okulungamya kwakola ku nsonga y’emmwaanyi. Omulimu Kafeero yeebazizza Katikkiro Mayiga olw’okubalambika entakera ku nsonga z’emmwaanyi awamu n’okubakubiriza bulijjo okubeera abakozi. Mukulambula kuno Katikkiro, asookedde wa Munnyarwanda wa Kabaka Owek. Yosam Kafeero Muyambi, oluvannyuma atuuse e Kaselutwe ewa Wilson Ntambazi, yeeyongeddeyo ku ffaamu ya Muhigira Coffee Estate era nalambula omulimi Patrick Ssemanda awamu n’omuvubuka Lawrence Kabumbuli nga bonna abasabye okunyweza ekkubo lyebakutte. Mu nteekateeka eno, Kamalabyonna abadde awereekeddwako minisita w’ Abavubuka, Emizannyo n’Okwewumuza Owek. Henry Kiberu Ssekabembe, Minisita w’ Amawulire Owek. Noah Kiyimba awamu n’abakungu abalala.

headline: Obwakabaka bwakukwatagana n’ebibiina by’obweggasi okutumbula emmwanyi
text: Obwakabaka bwa Buganda bwakukwatagana n’ebibiina by’obwegassi binnansangwa okwongera okutumbula ekirime ky’emmwanyi mu Buganda, kisobozese okuagoba obwavu mu bantu ba Buganda ne Uganda. Katikkiro Mayiga n’ abeebitibwa wamu naba Masaka Cooperative Union Bino byogeddwa Kamalabyonna wa Buganda, Charles Peter Mayiga, bw’abadde asisinkanye ab’ekibiina ky’obwegassi ekya Masaka Cooperative Union mu Bulange e Mmengo leero ku Lwokubiri. Owek. Mayiga agambye nti Nnyinimu Ssaabasajja Kabaka, azze abalagira okuzzaawo ebibiina by’obwegassi era nga guno gwe gwali omulamwa Amatikkira ga 26 mu 2019 kwe gaatambulira. “Ffe ng’abakulembera Obwakabaka, kye tulowooza kwe kukolagana n’ebibiina by’obwegassi ebiriwo nga Masaka Cooperative Union. Tutambulize wamu kaweefube w’ebibiina bino eby’obwegassi naddala bino ebyaffe ebyedda, Masaka Cooperative Union, Wamala Cooperative Union East ne West Mmengo Cooperative Union.” Mayiga bw’annyonnyodde. Ono agambye nti kiyinza okuba nga Buganda teyeetaaga kutandika bibiina bipya naye basobola okukola olukiiko olubataba ne bakkaanya ku ngeri y’okutambuzaamu ensonga. Katikkiro Mayiga nga alaga emmwanyi ezikolebwa aba Masaka Cooperatives Union Kamalabyonna Mayiga alambuludde nti oluvannyuma lw’okwagazisa abantu okulima emmwanyi n’okuzitumbula, kati balina okuzisuubula ku balimi bano, bazigatteko omutindo wamu n’okuzitunda ebweru. Ababuulidde nti baamaze dda okutondawo kkampuni ya Emmwanyi Terimba Ltd ng’eno y’egenda okukwatagana n’ebibiina bino awamu n’abalimi. Mayiga atenderezza omulimu ogwakolebwa Masaka Union, okuyamba Uganda ne Buganda era n’asiima ebimu ku bikulu bye basobodde okukola wakati mu bizibu bye bayitamu. Agambye nti enteekateeka ya Emmwanyi Terimba erimu ebirala okuli; okulima emmere n’okulunda, kibasobozese okufunamu emmere wamu n’okuliikiriza ettaka erikaddiye, wadde nga baasooka kusoosoowaza mmwanyi. Katikkiro Mayiga abakubirizza okufaayo ku mutindo gw’emmwanyi kubanga ebbeeyi kwe zigulibwa ku katale k’ensi yonna, esinziira ku mutindo. Ssentebe w’ekibiina kya Masaka Cooperative Union, Joseph Kavuma Mwanje, alaze Mukuumaddamula ebimu ku bye bakola era n’amubuulira n’okusoomoozebwa kwe basanga. Kavuma ku lwa banne, asuubizza okwongera okukolagana n’Obwakabaka basobole okuganyulwamu. Ensisinkano eno yeetabiddwamu Omumyuka Owoookubiri owa Katikkiro, Robert Waggwa Nsibirwa, Minisita Mayanja Nkalubo, Minisita Amis Kakomo n’abalala.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga atongozza ekitundu ky’omwaka B eky’ Emmwaanyi Terimba, abakuutidde ku mutindo
text: Mukuumaddamula Charles Peter Mayiga azzeemu okukuutira abalimi b’eggwanga mu ggwanga okufaayo ku mutindo gwazo nga batandikira ku ndokwa zebafuna okusimba bweba bakufuna mu mulimu guno. Okwogera bino Katikkiro Mayiga abadde ku bizinga by’e Ssese ku Lwokubiri nga alambula abalimi baayo, okuggulawo ekyuma ekisunsula emmwaanyi ekya Ssese Coffee Centre awamu nokutongoza omwaka B ogw’ Emmwaanyi Terimba. Mu kulambula kuno Owek. Mayiga asookedde wa Mw. Ssemanda Paul alima nokulunda ku kyalo Mirembe mu ggombolola ye Buyindi ku bizinga bye Kalangala mu Ssese.  “Ayagala okwongera omutindo ku mmwaanyi sibya kusiika kkaawa eyo gyebigwera. Emmwaanyi twagala zamutindo abalimi basobole okufunamu naye kitandikira ku ndokwa zokozesa. Bwoba olowooza eby’ omutindo sookera ku ndokwa okakasa nti zentuufu,” Katikkiro Mayiga bw’alambuludde. Ono era abakuutidde okufaayo ku nnima y’emmwaanyi kuba eno ekwatagana bulungi n’omutindo gw’emmwaanyi kuba ebigimusa nabalimisa abalina obukugu kitegeeza kufuna mu kirime kino. Oluvannyuma Mukuumaddamula yeyongeddeyo okuggulawo ekyuma ekisunsula emmwaanyi ku kyalo Buligo nga lino nalyo lya Ssemanda era ng’ono ataddewo n’emmeresezo y’ Emmwaanyi okusobola okuzituusa kwabo abazeetaaga. Mw. Paul Ssemanda nnanyini nnimiro agamba nti ekyamutandisa ennimiro kusomesa bantu abeeno ababadde ennyo mu kirime eky’ ebinanzi. Katikkiro Mayiga bw’atuuse ku kyalo Kalugulu ewali omuvuzi wa boodabooda Kyeswa Kizza nga naye alima emmwaanyi n’okulunda era abaayo naddala abavubuka ba booda booda abasabye okwettanira ekirime kino.  Bw’abadde ayogerako eri abavubuka be Ssese, Minisita w’Abavubuka, emizannyo n’okwewummuza, Owek Henry Ssekabembe Kiberu asabye abavubuka obutalinda bidde okutandika ku nteekateeka y’okweggya mu bwavu. Mu kwongera okutalaaga ebizinga, alambudde ennimiro y’omwami wa Kabaka ow’eggombolola ya Mutuba II Kalangala ku kyalo Mwena Eugen Kitaatire alina yiika 8 kyokka nga wano wakati mu binazi agamba yassaawo yakusomesezaako bantu yiika emu. Wano Owek. Hajji Amis Kakomo ategeezeza nti obwakabaka bwakwongera okussaawo abalimisa okuyambako abalimi okunyikira mu mmwanyi nga kati Buganda erina abalimisa abasoba mu 600 nga bano bonna balina kulaba nti omutindo gw’ emmwaanyi ezirimibwa mu Buganda gutumbuka. Oluvannyuma lw’okulambula abalimi abawerako, Kamalabyonna Mayiga akubye olukungaana ku mbuga y’essaza era wano watongolezza ekitundu ky’ Emmwaanyi Terimba B nasaba okunyiikira okukola.  Ye omwami w’essaza, Kweeba Augustine Kasirye ayanjulidde Katikkiro alipoota ku mmwanyi namutegeeza nti newankubadde nga ekyuma ekyaaliwo kyasaanawo baasigala balima era basanyufu nti mwami Ssemanda yabateereddewo ekyuma ekisunsula emmwanyi. Mu balala abawerekeddeko Katikkiro Mayiga mu kulambula kuno kuliko; Minisita wamawulire era omwogezi wa Buganda Owek. Noah Kiyimba, Owek. Mariam Mayanja Nkalubo Nassejje awamu n’abakungu abalala.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga atongozza eng’oma Ggwangamujje okulwanyisa COVID-19
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayigaatongozzaeng’oma Ggwangamujje egenda okukubwa Abaami ba Kabakamu nteekateeka y’okukunga abantu ba Beene wonna mu Buganda okusitukiramu balwanyise ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona era n’asaba Abaami okukulemberamu olutalo luno. Enteekateeka eno ebadde mu Bulange- Mmengo ku Lwokusatu era Mukuumaddamula asinzidde wano n’asaba abantu okumanya akabi akali mu bulwadde buno obwa Lumiimamawuggwe. “Kambabuulire empologoma eyatulumba ye Lumiimamawuggwe, etusensera, etulya tetulaba era tetutegedde kuba ffenna abali wano tusobola okuba nga tulina obulwadde nga tetumanyi, ayinza okuba mu ngalo, leka kwekwata mu nnyindo, mu maaso, mu mimwa. Akabi kajja tulina okutegeeza ensi nti empologoma ezze naye bwe weerwanako ogiwona naye bwe weekwata ku maaso ekulya.” Kamalabyonna Mayiga agamba nti mu buli mbeera, eggwanga lirina okusoosowaza ebyobulamu era n’asaba Abaami ba Kabaka okukulemberamu olutalo ku Lumiimamawuggwe nga Beene bwe yalagira. Okusinziira ku Katikkiro Mayiga, ekisinga okutta bantu mu bulwadde buno kwe kuba nti obulwadde buno bwetooloddwa obutamanya era abantu n’ebintu ebyandibayambye babyesammula nga balowooza nti birimu akabi. Mayiga asiimye aba Dreamline Products olw’obuyiiya mu kusaasaanya amawulire agakwata ku Sennyiga Corona kuba okuva edda obuyiiya bw’eng’oma omwali Saagalaagalamidde, Ggwangamujje n’endala, zaayambanga nnyo okutumbula embeera z’abantu n’okubakuuma. “Mu Mirembe egyayita abalya ensi baali abo abalina ffeeza ne zzaabu, ekiseera ne kijja ng’abalina amatwale nga Bungereza. Ekiseera ne kituuka nga abalina amafuta be baliwo naye batugamba nti, oyo agenda okulya ensi mu biseera eby’omu maaso y’oyo ategedde ebyempuliziganya era atambula n’okumanya.” Owek. Mayiga bw’alambuludde. Mu ngeri yeemu ku mukolo guno, Obwakabaka buyingidde mu ndagaano n’aba Dreamline Products nga ku lwa Buganda, Owek.Hajji Amisi Kakomo y’ataddeko omukono ate Kenneth Mulondo n’assaako ku lwa Dreamline Products. Minisita omubeeziow’ebyamawulire ne tekinologiya mu gavumenti eyaawakati,Owek.Joyce Nabbosa Ssebuggwawo asinzidde wano n’asaba abasomesa beegemese kisobozese okwanguyizagavumenti okukola enteekateeka z’okuggulawo amasomeroera n’asaba abantu okwekuuma ekirwadde kino. Omukungu wa Dreamline Products,Mw. Kenneth Mulondoategeezezza nti basinzidde ku bukulu bw’eng’oma ne bakkiriza nti esobola okukunga abantu okusobola okulwanyisa Ssenyiga Corona. Mu nteekateeka eno, eng’oma eno yaakukubibwa okukubiriza abantu okukola, okuteeka mu nkola ebiragiro by’abasawo ku kulwanyisa Ssenyiga coronanga mu binokuliko; okunaaba mu ngalo, okwambala obukookolo, okwewa amabanga n’ebirala.

headline: Bannayuganda basabiddwa okwetangira endwadde
text: Bannayuganda basabiddwa okufaayo okwetangira endwadde ezitali zimu bweba baagala okulaakulana n’okukyuusa embeera yabwe olwo Buganda edde ku ntikko. Okusaba kuno kukoleddwa Omulangira Felix Muteesa bw’abadde atikkula Amakula okuva mu bannassingo mu lubiri e Mmengo ku Lwokubiri. Bano Muteesa abasabye okwewala endwadde zinamutta basobole okubeera abalamu kuba abantu abalamu bokka be basobola okulaakulanya ensi Buganda. Omulangira era abakubiriza okuba abakozi nga lwebagya okusoboola okutuukiriza ebiruubirirwa byabwe . Katikkiro w’Ebyalo bya Kabaka Omuk.Moses Luutu asabye abazadde okwongera okugumiza obuvunqnnyizibwa bwabwe eri abaana okuteekateeka eggwanga eryenkya erituukiridde. Ye Omwami wa Kabaka amulamulirako eggombolola ya mumyuka Busimbi David Ssendikadiwa agamba nti basoomozebwa enjala kyokka nakakasa nti olw’obukulembeze obulungi ebisoomozo bagezezaako okubirinya ku nfeete. Mukwenda eyawummula era omukiise wa Ssingo mu lukiiko lwa Buganda owek. Stanley Kijjambu yeebaziza banassingo olw’okufaayo okutuukiriza ennono yabwe nga lino ryerimu ku makubo ag’okuzza Buganda ku ntikko Amakula gano gavudde mu ggombolola ya Mumyuka Busimbi okuva mu ssaza lye Ssingo.

headline: Bannabuddu beefumiitirizza ku Mukenenya
text: Bya Muwuluzi Yusuf  Abantu ba Ssaabasajja Kabaka mu ssaza ly’e Buddu basisinkanye okwefumiitiriza ku ngeri ekirwadde kya Mukenenya gye kikosezzaamu abantu naddala abaliko obulemu. Ppookino n’abamu ku baliko obulemu Bino byabaddewo eggulo ku lunaku lw’ensi yonna olw’ekirwadde kino era ng’ensisinkano eno yabaddemu ab’ekitongole kya MADIPHA ekiyambako abaliko obulemu naye nga mu kiseera kye kimu bawangaala n’ekirwadde kino n’okulaba bwe basobola okubulwanyisa. Ku mukolo ogwabadde ku ssaza nga gwabaddemu ebikonge by’Obwakabaka, abakulembeze mu Masaka, bannaddiini n’abakulembeze babaliko obulemu mu kitundu kino. Mu bubaka bwe obwamusomeddwa Ppookino Jude Muleke, Minisita wa gavumenti z’ebitundu mu Buganda, Owek.Joseph Kawuki yategeezezza nti abantu amaanyi babadde bagamalidde ku Ssennyiga Corona ne beerabira Mukenenya. Minisita yagasseeko nti Obwakabaka busaale nnyo mu kulwanyisa obulwadde bwa Ssiriimu era n’akubiriza abantu okwekuuma. “Tusaana tutaase abaliko obulemu obutasaabaana kawuka ka Mukenenya.” Bw’atyo Owek. Kawuuki bwe yayongeddeko era ne yeebaza essaza Buddu n’ekitongole kya MADIPHA. Ye Ppookino mu bubaka bwe yavumiridde nnyo ebikolwa eby’ekko ebyetobese mu kalulu kano naddala ebyo ebikolebwa abakuumaddembe. Wabula ono yasabye abavubuka okwewala ebikolwa eby’effujjo olwo lwe banaateekebwamu obwesige. Ssenkulu w’ekibiina kya MADIPHA, Musisi Richard, yannyonnyodde nti ng’abaliko obulemu basanga okusoomoozebwa okuwangaala n’ekirwadde kino. Rev. Fr. Aloysius Kalwowa nga ye yakiikiridde omusumba w’ssaza ly’e Masaka, Bishop Serverus Jjumba, ku lwa bannaddiini yasabye wabeewo okunoonyereza ku bintu ebiremesa abantu okuvaayo okwatula mu lwatu nti balina Siriimu nga n’abamu eddagala balimirira mu nkukutu. Oluvannyuma woofiisi ya Ppookino yawaddeyo ebimu ku bikozesebwa abantu abaliko obulemu.

headline: Abasawo b’e Mulago bayambako okubbayo abalwadde – Minisitule y’ebyobulamu
text: Kampala Abamu ku basawo b’eddwaliro ekkulu e Mulago basongeddwamu okubeera emabega w’omuzze gw’okubba abalwadde mu ddwaliro lino nebabatwala mu malwaliro g’obwannanyini. Kino kibotoddwa akulira eddwaliro lino  Dr Baterena Byarugaba  eggulo ku Lwokuna bweyabadde n’abakungu ba Minisitule y’ebyobulamu nga boogerako eri bannamawulire. Dr. Baterena agamba nti byebakazuulawo biraga nti waliwo bakayungirizi abalinda abalwadde mu bifo awasimba emmotoka  ku ddwaliro lino wamu n’abasawo ababuzaabuza abalwadde nebabatwala mu malwaliro agaliraanye Mulago. Ono yalaajanidde abakulu mu Minisitule okubaako kyebakolawo kuba omuzze guno gutadde obulamu bwa bannayuganda mu matigga. Dr. Baterena yawadde eky’okulabirako ky’omwana eyagyibwa e Mulago natwalibwa mu ddwaliro ly’obwannanyini kyokka nalongoosebwa bub inga kati ensonga ziri mu kkooti ekitatanye ekifananyi ky’eddwaliro lino. Bino webijidde nga Minisita omubeezi ow’ebyobulamu Robinah Nabbanja yatandikawo okulambula eddwaliro lino buli Lwakuna okusobola okutereeza emirimu wamu n’okutumbula obuweereza nga alwanyisa obulyi bw’enguzi. Kinajjukirwa nti mu mwaka 2019, Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni yalagira amalwaliro agatunda eddwaliro naddala mu ddwaliro lino okuggalawo nga agamba nti bano bali bawandikira abalwadde eddagala eriri mu malwaliro gaabwe olwo nebabasindikayo okuligula.

headline: Katikkiro Akuutidde Bannayuganda Obutassa Mukono Kukulwanyisa Kirwadde Kya Coronavirus
text: Katikkiro wa Buganda Charles Peter Mayiga asabye abantu ba Uganda obutasuula nnanga mu kulwanyisa ekirwadde kya coronavirus. Bwabadde ayogerako eri eggwanga mu maka g’obwakatikkiro, mu Butikkiro e Mmengo, Mayiga agambye nti abantu bangi kati beerabidde nti tebalina kukwata bantu mungalo, obuteekwata mu nnyindo, akamwa n’amaaso, okwambala obukookolo wamu n’okussa mu nkola enkola ya tonsemberera. Oweek. Mayiga ategeezezza nti ssenyiga kolona tannafuna ddagala. “Ng’ojjeeko ennambika etuweebwa ab’ebyobulamu tulina okusigala nga tutambulira ku nnambika etuweebwa gavumenti; tulina okubitambulirako; era ekimu ku bbyo kwekusigala ewaka eri abo abatalina nnyo nsonga ebajjayo. Abaana mubakuumire awaka ate abazadde mufube okulaba nga beewala emize,” Mayiga bwagambye. Asabye abaana okufuba okusomera awaka era n’abazadde okufuba okulaba ng’abaana bagoberera byebalaba ku terefaayina. Mu birala, Mayiga asabye abantu okukomya okukungaana ku mikolo egy’enjawulo kubanga gyebakoma okukungaana abangi, gyebakomya okutambuza akawuka kolona. “Ensi tejja kusaanawo nga tokoze mukolo naye bwekiba kyakufa nakuwona, mu kikole nga mu kungaana batono. Ebiragiro bino byonna bikaluubiriza naye bitaasa bulamu bwaffe kubanga kyekyokulwanyisa kyokka kyetulinawo,” Mayiga bwagambye. Agasseeko nti Pulezidenti Museveni bweyatoowolokosa ku mateeka g’omuggalo abantu abamu baalowooza kolona aweddeyo. “Twagala abantu bakole basobole okweyimirizaawo, balabirire abantu baabwe, bakulaakulane badde ku ntikko, twagala Buganda ngeri ku ntikko mu byenfuna ne mu mbeera z’abantu naye twagala abantu basooke bataase obulamu,” Mayiga bwagambye. Woosomera bino ng’omuwendo gw’abantu abaakazuulwamu kolona guweze 724 mu Uganda.

headline: Abapoliisi bakutendekebwa ku nkwata y’abasibe abalina COVID-19
text: Kampala Oluvanyuma lw’abantu abakwatibwa ekirwadde ki ssennyiga Corona mu makomera n’obuduukulu bwa poliisi okweyongera, poliisi mu Kampala etandise okutendeka basajja baayo ku ngeri gyebalina okukwata n’okuggaliramu abasibe abalina ekirwadde kino. Abamu ku bapoliisi abali mu Kampala Kino kiddiridde okuggalwa kwa poliisi ye Kawempe ng’entabwe yava ku mulenzi ow’emyaka 15 eyali aggaliddwa ku misango egyekuusa ku kusobya ku mwana ow’emyaka 3 wabula oluvanyuma nazuulibwa nti yalina n’ekirwadde ki COVID-19. Poliisi egamba nti era kino kyabazibula amaaso ku bifo ebikuumirwamu abaana abataweza myaka 18 ababeera bazizza emisango. Omwogezi wa poliisi mu Kampala n’emirilaano Patrick Onyango, yategeezezza nga bwe batawanyizibwa ekizibu ky’okujjuzo mu buduukulu bwabwe naye nakakasa nti bakola kyonna okulaba nga abasibe bagoberera amateeka agatangira COVID-19. Onyango yanyonyodde nga poliisi bwetadddewo emitendera egy’enjawulo okulaba nga baziyiza ekirwadde kino okusaasaana. “Ekitongole kyaffe ekikola ku by’obulamu kyatuwadde dda ebintu ebyeyambisibwa okwetangira ekirwadde kino. Nga ne poliisi zonna zamaze dda okuweebwa ‘Sanitizers’ wamu ne ttanka z’amazzi okusobola okuyambako okutangira ekirwadde kino,” Onyango bweyategeezezza. Egimu ku mitendera egiteereddwawo okutangira ekirwadde kino okusaasaana mulimu; okuyimiriza abagenyi mu bifo ebikuumirwamu abaana abato, okusala ku muwendo gw’abantu abagenda ku poliisi wamu n’engeri endala eziwerako. Onyango yasabye abantu okugondera ebiragiro bya Minisitule y’ebyobulamu kiyambe okulwanyisa ekirwadde kino.

headline: Abawangaala ne  Mukenenya basiimye Kabaka olw’okulwanyisa ekirwadde
text: Masaka – Buddu Abantu ba Kabaka mu Buddu basiimbye Omuteregga olw’okubeera omusaale mu kulwanyisa akawuka ka Mukenenya  mu Uganda ne Africa yonna, ekintu ekiyambye ku mbeera. Abamu ku bano nga balina akawuka ssaako abatalina, okwogera bino basinzidde mu musomo ogw’okubabangula ku bika by’obuwuka obulwaza Mukenenya obuliwo ensangi zino wamu n’okubanjulira alipoota ekwatagana  ku kuvumbula eddagala erinaawonya ssaako n’okutangira Mukenenya ku Maple leaf Hotel esangibwa mu kibuga. Omusomo guno gwetabiddwamu abantu okuva mu biti ebyenjawulo omuli; Bannaddiini, abasawo, Bannamawulire, abakulembeze ku mitendera egyenjawulo, abakulira ebitongole by’obwannakyewa, ssaako n’abo abalina akawuka ka Mukenenya, n’abantu abaze batambulirwako okunoonyereza kuno. Abantu abalina akawuka bategeezezza nti Ssaabasajja Kabaka okuvaayo n’abakubiriza okumira eddagala, okwekebeza, ssaako okubagumya,  ekibayambye okusigala nga balamu era ne bamwagaliza amazaalibwa amalungi. “Tusaba Katonda awangaaze Ssaabasajja Kabaka wa Buganda kubanga atubeereddewo nnyo ffe abantu abalina akawuka ka Mukenenya ng’atuwa obubaka n’ebigambo ebirungi ebutugumya, ebituzzaamu amaanyi kubanga twali twaggwaamu essuubi era singa si ye singa  abamu twafa dda.” Abamu ku bantu abalina akawuka bwe bategeezezza. Mu ngeri y’emu Rev. Fr. Emmanuel Katabazi  nga y’akulira eby’obulamu mu ssaza ly’Eklezia Katolika ery’e Masaka, ategeezezza nti omusomo guno  gubayambye  okubabangula ku bikwatagana n’akawuka ka Mukenenya ebipya bye babadde tebamanyi. Ate ye Dr.  Sheila  Balinda nga kakensa mu kunoonyereza ku kawuka ka Mukenenya  okuva mu kitongole kya Medical Research Council, agambye  nti babadde balina okutegeka omusomo guno okusobola okutegeeza Bannabuddu ebivudde mu kunoonyereza olw’okuba nti beewaddeyo nnyo  mu nteekateeka ey’okulaba ng’olutalo lw’okulwanyisa akawuka kano luggusibwa. Dr Balinda agambye nti mu kunoonyereza okupya okwakatuukibwako, bavumbudde  nti obuwuka bwanjawulo era nga si bwonna obubeera mu mubiri gw’omuntu afunye Siriimu nti, buviirako omulala okulwala Siriimu. Ono asinzidde wano n’agumya bannauganda nti eggwanga Uganda lirina abakugu abakenkuse ennyo mu kuketta n’okutegeera enneeyisa endya ne nneebaka ya kawuka kano nga we batuuse batandise okukataayiza. Ono alabudde abo bonna abatannakafuna obutalyaguzibwa  kyokka beekuume akawuka kano.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga asabye abantu okuwaayo omusaayi kitaase obulamu
text: Bulange Katikkiro wa Buganda, Charles Peter Mayiga, asabye abantu bonna bafeeyo okugaba omusaayi kiyambeko okutaasa obulamu bw’abo abagwetaaga kubanga beeyongera buli kadde. Katikkiro Mayiga nga atongoza Empenduzo y’omusaayi Okusaba kuno Katikkiro Mayiga akukoledde mu Bulange Mmengo olwaleero ku Lwokubiri ng’atongoza kaweefube w’okugaba omusaayi agenda okumala ennaku nnya nnambirira. “Tutaase obulamu ekisookerwako nga tufa kukugaba n’omusaayi ogunaatumala, bwe tunaamala okutaasa obulamu, ebirala binaatwogerwako.” Katikkiro Mayiga bw’asabye. Katikkiro Mayiga asinzidde wano n’atongoza empenduzo (App) eya tekinologiya w’omutimbagano eyakoleddwa ekibiina ekigatta abayindi ekya Indian Association, ng’eno yaakuyamba okumanya ekika ky’omusaayi, agwetaaga n’eddwaliro w’asobola okugufuna mu bwangu. Owek. Mayiga agambye nti obulamu ky’ebyobugagga Katonda kye yawa abantu ekisinga ebirala byonna era n’abasaba okubulabirira obulungi nga balya bulungi n’okwejjanjabya nga balwadde awamu n’okwetangira endwadde ezisoboka nga Siriimu ne Corona. Ono agambye nti wadde bino bisobola okukolebwa naye waliwo ebintu ng’omusaayi abantu bye batalinaako buyinza ate nga bagwetaaga okusigala nga balamu nga gutambuza emmere n’ebirungo omubiri bye guba gwetaaga. Katikkiro abasabye okuyamba abantu ababeera bagwetaaga omuli; abakyala abazaala, abagudde ku bubenje, abalwadde abalina endwadde nga Nnalubiri, Kkookolo awamu n’embeera endala ezeetaaga okuteekebwako omusaayi. Kamalabyonna asabye ebitongole ebyenjawulo mu ggwanga okuvaayo okudduukirira kaweefube ono nga bakwatagana n’ekitongole kya Ssaabasajja Kabaka. Ssenkulu wa Kabaka Foundation, Omukungu Kaggwa Ndagala, ategeezezza nti Obwakabaka bwegatta ku Uganda Red Cross okusobola okuziba eddibu eririwo ku bbula ly’omusaayi ate ng’abagwetaaga bangi era ng’enteekateeka eno yaakumala ennaku nnya (4). Dr. Nazziwa Byabazaire asiimye Obwakabaka olw’okubawa omukisa mu kaseera kano aka Ssennyiga Corona kubanga abantu abagwetaaga buli kadde beeyongera ate nga teriiyo kkolero likola musaayi okuggyako okweyambisa abantu abasobola okugugaba. Kaweefube ono awomeddwamu omutwe ab’ekitongole kya Kabaka Foundation nga bayambibwako aba Indian Association, Mengo Hospital, Uganda Blood Bank ne Uganda Red cross.

headline: Buganda yakutta omukago naba National Drug Authority
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga ategeezezza nti Buganda yakukola omukago n’ekitongole ekivunaanyizibwa ku kulondoola eddagala mu ggwanga ki National Drug Authority okwongera okuteereza ensonga z’ebyobulamu mu Buganda ne Uganda. Ekirangiriro kino Owek. Mayiga akikoledde mu Bulange Mmengo bw’abadde asisinkanye abakungu ba National Drug Authority abakulembeddwa Dr. David Nahamya nagamba nti ekiseera kituuse abakola eddagala ly’obutonde bakwatagane n’ekitongole kino okusobola okutambulira mu bulambulukufu. Owek. Mayiga annyonnyodde nti Obwakabaka bufaayo nnyo ku bantu babwo era bukola buli kimu okulaba nti abantu babwo babeera balamu okusobola okuzza Buganda ku ntikko. Mayiga ategeezezza nti eddagala ly’obutonde lisobola okukola bulungi naye walina okubaawo enkolagana n’okuwuliziganya wakati w’ekitongole ki NDA awamu n’abantu ab’enjawulo abanoonyereza ku ddagala ly’ ekinnansi n’obutonde. Ono agasseeko nti kati Buganda egenda kukwatagana n’ekitongole kino okulaba engeri abasawo abali mu ddagala ly’obutonde gyebasobola okulambikibwa wakati mu kugoberera ebbago eririwo ku nsonga eno. Ye Minisita w’Ekikula kyabantu, ebyobulamu, ebyenjigiriza era avunaanyizibwa ku woofiisi ya Nnabagereka, Owek. Dr. Prosperous Nankindu, ategeezezza nti Buganda erina enteekateeka ez’enjawulo okutumbula eby’obulamu kuba Kabaka ayagala abantu be nga balamu. Ekitongole kino kyatandika mu 1993 era nga kivunanyizibwa okulaba ng’abantu bafuna eddagala etuufu ery’omutindo ate nga sirabuseere. Akulira ekitongole kino, Dr. David Nahamya agambye asanyukidde eky’okukwatagana ne Buganda era nategeeza nti baliko kaweefube gwebatandise okulaba nti balwanyisa okukozesa ebiragalalagala mu baana abato okusobola okutaasa ebiseera byabwe eby’omu maaso.

headline: Abakkiriza ensanvu buli kusinza si bwenkanya – Kazimba Mugalu
text: Namirembe Ssaabalabirizi w’Ekkanisa ya Uganda, Stephen Kazimba Mugala asabye Pulezidenti Museveni akyuseemu ku biragiro ebipya bye yawedde bwe yabadde aggulawo amasinzizo, nga ayogerako eri eggwanga ku mbeera y’ekirwadde kya COVID-19 ku lunaku lwa Ssande. Ssaabalabirizi Kazimba Mugalu Museveni yaddirizza ku muggalo gw’ebifo ebimu bwe yalagidde amasinzizo okuggulawo oluvannyuma lw’okumala emyezi mukaaga nga gaggaddwa wabula n’alagira bano bafube okukuuma ebiragiro bya Ssennyiga Corona. Yalagidde abakkiriza bawulwemu ebibinja bya bantu nsanvu kiyambeko obutasaasaanya kirwadde kino. Bweyabadde ayogerako eri bannamawulire ku Lutikko e Namirembe ku Mmande, Kazimba yasabye Pulezidenti Museveni akkirize omuwendo ku bantu abalina okusaba gutuukane n’obunene bw’esinzizo. “Lutikko yaffe ku Ssande emu ebeeramu abantu abawera 4000 mu kusaba okw’enjawulo, bw’ogamba bano tubateeke mu bibinja by’abantu 70 tuba tugenda kwetaaga okusaba kwa mirundu 57 okusbola okubamalawo. Kino tekikolerako ddala,” Kazimba bwe yategeezezza. Kazimba yasabye gavumenti ekkirize okusinza okwawamu kuba ebifo bino bisobola bulungi okugoberera ebiragiro bya COVID-19. Ssaabalabirizi yakubirizza abakkiriza okusigala nga basabira ku leediyo, ttivvi, be ku mitimbagano kibayambeko okwekuumira ku Katonda. Ono yasabye amasomero agali ku musingi gw’ekkanisa ya Uganda okukolagana ne minisitule y’ebyenjigiriza basobole okuteekerateekera abayizi abagenda okukola ebibuuzo byabwe ebyakamalirizo. Yasuubizza ng’ekitongole ky’ekkanisa eky’ebyenjigiriza bwe kyetegese okubakwasizaako. Kazimba yasiimye ekitongole ekirondoola eby’enjigiriza ebyawaggulu olw’okukkiriza ssettendekero wa Uganda Christian University (UCU) okusomesa abayizi ku Yintaneeti.

headline: Mulonde abalina emiramwa egitugasa nga Buganda – Owek. Mayiga
text: Bulange- Mmengo Kamalabyonna wa Buganda, Charles Peter Mayiga, asabye abalonzi okulonda abakulembeze abafaayo ku byenfuna, eddembe ly’obuntu wamu n’Obulamu bw’abantu be bakulembera mu kalulu kano aka 2021. Owek. Mayiga nga akwasa Ssentebe wa Masaka, Jude Mbabali omujoozi gweyaguze Okwogera bino Kamalabyonna abadde atikkula Oluwalo olw’obukadde obusobye mu 40 okuva mu Busiro wamu ne bannabyabufuzi abakyadde embuga olunaku lwaleero ku Lwokubiri mu bimuli bya Bulange. Mu Luwalo lwaleero, eggombolola ya Nsangi y’enywedde akendo n’eddirirwa ab’e Kikandwa. “Mulonde abantu abo abalina emiramwa egitugasa nga Buganda, mulonde abo abalina emiramwa egikomyawo ekitiibwa kya Uganda okuyitibwa ekkula lya Africa.” Katikkiro Mayiga bw’agambye. Ow’eggombola nga afuna ekiwandiiko okuva ewa Katikkiro Mayiga Katikkiro Mayiga annyonnyodde nti Buganda erina omugabo munene mu Uganda era n’alabula abakola obuzannyo ku masaza agali mu Buganda nga baagala okugawula nti, tebajja kubakkiriza. Ono agambye nti kasita omuntu assa ekitiibwa mu nnono ya Buganda tebabeera na nsonga lwaki tebatambula naye. Owek. Mayiga ategeezezza nti kikyamu okulowooza nti ebyobufuzi kazannyo kuba tebisobola kubeera kazannyo ne bizza Buganda ku ntikko wadde okukuza Uganda, kubanga kino kirina kuva mu bukulembeze. Asabye abantu okwerinda ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona kuba gyekiri era baleme kubuzaabuzibwa byabufuzi, wabula n’avumirira ekya gavumenti okutta abantu ng’erwanyisa Ssennyiga Corona. Kamalabyonna Charles Peter Mayiga ategeezezza nti enkola y’Oluwalo eyamba okutaba Oluganda kubanga Buganda erimu amawanga mangi era n’ebiti by’abantu bingi era ng’okuva edda Buganda erimu ebintu ebirimu ebibaawula. Minisita wa gavumenti ez’ebitundu era Ssaabawolereza w’Obwakabaka, Christopher Bwanika, ategeezezza nti Oluwalo nkola ya nnono era ne yeebaza abaluleese. Ono era y’ayanjudde omugenyi wa Katikkiro ow’enjawulo, Omulangira Namuyonjo okuva e Bugerere ng’ono yazze ne ttiimu gy’akola nayo era nga bano baguze emijoozi okusobola okwetaba mu nteekateeka y’emisinde gya Kabaka. Ssebwana Kiberu Charles Kisiriiza, asiimye obuwulize bw’abaami b’amasaza n’amagombolola. Ono era yeebazizza bannabyabufuzi abakiise embuga olw’okukkiriza okukyala embuga. Omubaka Medard Ssegona ategeezezza nti ekyabatwala mu Palamenti kwe kukendeeza ku bifunfugu ebikasukirwa Ssaabasajja Kabaka n’Obuganda, okulaba nti babikwata. Ono asabye Mukuumaddamula abagambire ku balina emmundu bakomye okutugumbula abantu kubanga kiyitiridde. Mmeeya wa ttawuni y’e Nsangi, Hajji Abdul Kiyimba, asiimye Katikkiro Mayiga olw’okukolerera Obuganda era n’amusaba amuwaddeko eddusu asobole okuwangula akalulu. Abalala abeetabye ku mukolo guno kubaddeko Minisita w’ebyettaka era ng’omugenyi ow’enjawulo abadde Omulangira Namuyonjo aguze emijoozi okwenyigira mu nteekateeka y’emisinde gy’Amazaalibwa.

headline: Kkooti egobye ogwa People Power obutabeera mpandiise
text: Kampala Kkooti etaputa Ssemateeka mu Kampala egobye omusango ogwali guwakanya ekisinde kya People Power ekikulirwa Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu aka Bobi Wine, okukolera mu ggwanga nga si kiwandiise mu mateeka agafuga ebibiina by’ebyobufuzi. Leero ku Lwokubiri, abalamuzi 4 aba kkooti eno okuli; omumyuka wa Ssaabalamuzi Richard Buteera, Kenneth Kakuru, Catherine Bamugemereire ne Irene Mulyagonja, bategeezezza nti kkooti eno terina buyinza kuwulira musango nga guno era bwebatyo ne bagugoba. “Omuwaabi teyeesigama ku nnyingo 50 ng’aleeta omusango gwe era ne mu mpaaba ye tagisiinyaako. Noolwekyo mu ndaba yange omusango guno gwalina kuwaabwa omuntu ng’agoberera ennyingo eyo era gwalina kutwalibwa mu kkooti enkulu si wano.” Omulamuzi Mulyagonja bw’asomye ensala ye. Abalamuzi abalala okuli; Richard Buteera, Kenneth Kakuru ne Catherine Bamugemereire nabo bakkaanyiza ne Mulyagonja wadde ng’omuwaabi tebamulagidde kuliyirira bawawaabirwa. Wabula Omulamuzi Christopher Mandrama ayawukanye ku banne n’agamba nti kyali kikyamu Kyagulanyi okutambuliza emirimu gye mu People Power omwali n’okuvujjirira abantu okuvuganya ate ng’ekibiina kino si kiwandiise mu mateeka. Mu mwaka gwa 2019 munnayuganda Aden Rutaro Ntare, yatwala Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu aka Bobi Wine mu kkooti awamu n’eyali Pulezidenti wa Forum for Democratic Change (FDC),  ng’abavunaana okukulembera ebisinde bino ebitali biwandiise mu mateeka. Rutaro yagamba nti Kyagulanyi y’akulira People Power ng’olumu beeyita ‘People Power-Uganda’ oba ‘People Power’ n’ekigendererwa ky’okuwa abantu akadaala basobole okuvuganya mu bifo ebyenjawulo. Ate ye Dr. Besigye, Rutaro yamuvunaana kutondawo People’s Government’ eyeefaananyiriza gavumenti eri mu buyinza, ekintu ky’agamba nti kikkirizibwa bibiina byabufuzi ebiwandiise mu mateeka.

headline: Amuriat akakasiddwa n’atabukira abapoliisi
text: Kampala Akwatidde ekibiina kya Forum for Democratic Change (FDC) bbendera, Patrick Oboi Amuriat, avumiridde enneeyisa y’abeebyokwerinda n’engeri gye bamukuttemu bw’abadde agenda okwewandiisa ku kisaawe e Kyambogo. Oboi Amuriat nga atuusiddwa e  Kyambogo Amuriat ab’ebyokwerinda okubadde amagye ne poliisi bamukutte ne bamuteeka mu mmotoka yaabwe olwo ne bamutwala ku kisaawe e Kyambogo we babadde beewandiisiza. Ono atuuse talina ngatto mu bigere. “Leero nzize okwewandiisa ng’omusibe, oluvannyuma lw’okuwambibwa nga ngezaako okufuna ebiwandiiko byange okuva ku woofiisi yange e Najjanankumbi, mpambiddwa ab’ebyokwerinda nebanteeka mu mmotoka kika kya Saluuni era bampisizza ddala bubi.” Amuriat bw’agambye Ono ng’addiridde Kyagulanyi mu kwewandiisa, ategeezezza ssentebe w’akakiiko kano, Omulamuzi Byabakama, nga bw’aleeteddwa ng’omuwambe. Oboi ategeezezza bannamawulire nga bwe yawambiddwa poliisi wakati ng’agenda ku kitebe ky’ekibiina e Najjanankumbi okufuna empapula ze wamu n’okwegatta ku bantu b’abadde alina okugenda nabo. Amuriat atuukidde mu bigere, agambye nti abadde afa kimu kumukakasa nga kati ebikolwa bya poliisi nga bino tebigenda kumulemesa kunoonya kalulu. Oboi alaze abantu by’asuubira okutandikirako ng’alondeddwa era nga mu bifo mulimu okutwala mu maaso enkola ya ‘Defiance’ eyatandikibwa Dr. Kizza Besigye. Asuubizza okuyamba bamufunampola okusitula embeera zaabwe basobole okweyagalirira mu ggwanga lyabwe. We tukoledde eggulire lino nga poliisi tennavaayo mu butongole kunnyonnyola nsonga zaakwasizza Amuriat.

headline: Balabudde UPDF ku kweyingiza mu by’obufuzi ebyekubiira
text: Kampala Ebibiina by’obwannakyewa ebiruubirira okunnyikiza demokulaasiya mu Uganda, birabudde abajaasi ba UPDF ne Poliisi, okukomya okweyingiza mu by’obufuzi wamu n’okufulumya ebigambo ebisobola okutabangula emirembe naddala mu kaseera kano ak’okulonda. Senkulu wa FHRI, Dr. Livingstone Ssewanyana Ssenkulu w’ekitongole kya Foundation for Human Rights Initiative (FHRI), Dr. Livingstone Ssewanyana, yategeezezza omukutu gwa URN mu mboozi eyakafubo nti, ebigambo bya bannamagye ebigamba nti, “Tetusobola kuwaayo buyinza eri omuntu atali munnamagye,” tebisaanidde mu kaseera kano ak’okulonda. Kino kiddiridde omuduumizi w’enkambi y’amagye e Kasajjagirwa mu Masaka, Brig. Deus Sande, okusinziira ku mukolo ogwali gutegekeddwa bannakibiina kya NRM okusiima emirimu gy’ amajje nategeeza nti nga amajje tebasobola kuwaayo buyinza eri omuntu atali munnamagye. Mu ngeri y’emu ne Nnampala wa gavumenti, Ruth Nankabirwa, yalabikidde ku katambi ng’agamba abantu b’e Kiboga nga Pulezidenti Museveni bw’atasobola kuwaayo buyinza kulekawo mafuta ge. Bano Dr. Ssewanyana abalabudde nti balina okumanya nti obuyinza bw’abantu ate nga be balonzi era nga singa basalawo ne balonda omuntu omulala yenna, amagye galina kukola kimu kya kugondera biragiro bye. Omukwanaganya w’ekitongole ekirondoola ensonga z’okulonda ‘Citizens Coalition on Electoral Democracy’ -CCEDU, Charity Ahimbisibwe, yannyonnyodde nti Minisita asobola okusonyiyibwa ku bigambo ‘Tetusobola kuwaayo buyinza,’ naye si baduumizi b’amagye abaalayira okuweereza bannayuganda. Ahimbisibwe yagasseeko nti munnamagye oba omupoliisi eyagoera ebigambo ebiweebuula enteekateeka y’okulonda, agezaako kukuma mu bantu muliro era n’asaba bano bavunaanibwe mu bwangu, abalala babalabireko. Omutunuulizi w’ensonga z’ebyokwerinda, Fred Egesa, agamba nti ebigambo bino bigenderere ng’ababyogera bagezaako kumalamu bavuganya gavumenti maanyi. Ono alabudde nti singa abantu banaggwaamu essuubi ly’okukozesa akalulu okukyusa obuyinza, bayinza okwagala okukozesa amakubo amalala.

headline: Kasule Lumumba :  Bobi Wine okuggyayo omusango yakikoze kwonoona kifaananyi kya kkooti
text: Kampala Ssaabawandiisi w’ekibiina kya National Resistance Movement (NRM), Justine Kasule Lumumba, alabudde bannabyabufuzi okukomya okweyagaliza n’ebigendererwa ebikyamu mu kifo ky’okwonoona ekifaananyi kya kkooti z’eggwanga. Ssaabawandiisi wa NRM, Kasule Lumumba  Kino kiddiridde munnakibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP) era Pulezidenti waakyo Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu aka Bobi Wine okulagira bannamateeka be okuggyayo omusango mw’abadde awakanyiza obuwanguzi bwa Museveni ng’agamba nti kkooti yazeefuga. Lumumba yalumirizza Kyagulanyi nti okusooka yali agaanye okugenda mu kkooti kyokka n’amala ne yeekyusa, ekiraga nti yalina ebigendererwa bye. “Ensonga ya Mw. Kyagulanyi okugamba nti Ssaabalamuzi Owiny-Dollo n’Omulamuzi Mike Chibita okuva mu musango olw’okuba baakolaganako ne Museveni ky’abadde kyakwekwasa.” Lumumba bwe yagambye. Okusinziira Ku Lumumba, Pulezidenti Museveni abadde mu by’obufuzi n’obukulembeze okumala emyaka 50 nga kizibu okusanga omuntu atakolaganyeeko naye mu banene abali mu ggwanga. Lumumba yeewuunyizza lwaki Kyagulanyi yakyukidde ekitongole ekiramuzi ate nga mu 2020 omulamuzi Ssekaana yawa ensala ye, Kyagulanyi n’awangula omusango ku kuwandiisibwa kw’ekibiina kye. “Mw. Kyagulanyi ne banne baali basanyufu nga bawangudde omusango naye kati olw’okuba kkooti ensukkulumu yagaanye okubakkiriza okukola ennongoosereza mu mpaaba yaabwe era ne baweebwa amagezi ku kye balina okukola naye kati kkooti azivumirira.” Lumumba bwe yakkaatiriza. Lumumba yasabye Kyagulanyi okutawa bawagizi be ssuubi litaliiwo era bakomye okukkiririza mu bulimba obutambulira ku mutimbagano omuli n’emmeeri ya Amerika eyagobye e Mombasa.

headline: Bobi Wine alumbye Pulezidenti Museveni ku kuwagira okutulugunya bannansi
text: Kyaggwe Akwatidde ekibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP), Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu(Bobi Wine), alumbye Pulezidenti Museveni ku bigambo bye yayogedde ng’avumirira abeekalakaasa n’okubalabula obutakiddira. Bobi Wine nga atabaala Nakifuma Kyagulanyi bw’abadde anoonya akalulu mu bitundu by’e Mukono ku Mmande, agambye nti aba NRM bapangisa abavubuka ne babagatta mu bawagizi baabwe okukola effujjo ku poliisi n’amagye okubavumaganya. Kino kiddiridde Pulezidenti Museveni eggulo bwe yabadde ayogerako eri eggwanga, okulabula abeekalakaasi abakuba abapoliisi okukikomya era n’awagira ekya bakuumaddembe abakuba amasasi mu okwetaasa oluvannyuma lw’okukwata Kyagulanyi eyali e Luuka mu Busoga ng’anoonya akalulu. “Museveni yabadde ku ttivvi jjo n’agamba nti agenda kusasula abantu be battidde abantu baabwe naye abantu b’e Nakifuma ka mbabuuze, omuntu ayinza kusasula ssente mmeka okukuttira owuwo.” Kyagulanyi bw’abuuzizza abawagizi be. Kyagulanyi ategeezezza ab’e Nakifuma okunyweza obumu nga tebafudde ku mawanga g’abantu kubanga bonna ebibaluma bye bimu. Ab’eno Kyagulanyi abagambye nti olutalo lw’okuggya Museveni ku buyinza lugenda kubaamu okufiirwa n’okwelekereza era n’abakunga obutakomya kubanja ddembe lyabwe. Kyagulanyi yayaniriziddwa ebikumi n’ebikumi by’abantu e Nakifuma, yavuddewo bubi n’abakuumaddembe obwedda abamugaana okukozesa enguudo zimwasa njala nga bagamba nti kijja kuleetawo akalipaggano k’ebidduka mu kitundu kino. Abamu ku balonzi e Nakifuma Kyagulanyi bamusabye olutuuka mu ntebe asooke abakolerere ku by’obulamu, ebyenguudo wamu n’okubagobako obwavu obuyitiridde mu byalo byabwe.

headline: Omubaka Sseggirinya alayidde, agamba ssente z’emmotoka agenda kuzigabira abalonzi
text: Kampala Munnakibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP), Muhammad Sseggirinya alayiziddwa ku bubaka bwa Kawempe North mu Palamenti y’e 11 era ono olumaze okukuba ebirayiro n’ategeeza nti ssente obukadde 200 ezigenda okumuweebwa okugula emmotoka ajja zigabira abalonzi. Sseggirinya eyavudde ebweru w’eggwanga n’adda okulayira ku katuuti, agenze bamukwatiridde era bw’abadde ayogerako eri abannamawulire agambye nti agenda kufuba okulaba nti buli maka mu  Kawempe bafuna ku buwoomi bwa ssente z’emmotoka zino. Ono agamba nti kino akikoze okulaba ng’addiza ku bantu be abaamwesiga ne bamusindika mu Palamenti eno. Era kuno agenda kwogerezaako enteekateeka ya Segibox nga muno agenda kuba awa buli maka amanaku mu Kawempe emitwalo 10 buli mwezi. “Sigenda kugula mmotoka mpya ng’enda kusigala nga nkozesa eno, ssente z’emmotoka ng’enda kuziwa bannakawempe.” Sseggirinya bw’ategeezezza. Ono awadde eky’okulabirako ekyali e Bufalansa mu 1789  olw’okwejalabya kwa Kabaka waayo, Louis XVI n’omukyala Marie Antoinette, abaali mu bulamu obulungi ate nga bannansi baavu lunkupe.  “Bali mu kugula mmotoka za bbeeyi ng’abalonzi baabwe babonaabona olw’ebyobulamu ebibi, ebyenjigiriza bifu n’ebizibu ebirala. Nze saagala kubeera bwetyo y’ensonga lwaki obukadde 200 ez’emmotoka nziwadde bannakawempe.” Sseggirinya bw’akiggumiza. Buli mubaka asuubirwa okuweebwa ssente obukadde 200 basobole okugulamu emmotoka ezinaabayamba okutambulizaamu emirimu mu kisanja kino eky’emyaka ettaano. Sseggirinya agamba akyali mulwadde olw’ebyo ebyamutuusibwako mu kkomera e Kitalya era ng’asuubira okuddayo e Nairobi gy’amaze omwezi omulamba ng’ajjanjabwa ekibumba n’amatu.

headline: Bobi Wine, Amuriat, Muntu basabye abantu balonde  bakuume akalulu
text: Kampala Abeesimbyewo ku bwapulezidenti okuli; Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu (Bobi Wine), Patrick Oboi Amuriat ne Mugisha Muntu, basabye bannayuganda okulonda mu bungi era bakuume akalulu kaabwe oluvannyuma lw’okulonda ku Lwokuna. Mugisha Muntu, Oboi Amuriat ne Bobi Wine Bano okusaba kuno bakukoledde mu lukung’aana lwa bannamawulire lwe batuuzizza ku Hotel Africana olwaleero ku Lwokubiri. Kyagulanyi ne banne basabye bannayuganda okukuuma akalulu k’omulundi guno nga tebafuddeyo ku kibiina kya byabufuzi oli mw’ali naye balwanirire obuwanguzi bwa bannayuganda. Bino we bijjidde ng’ebbula ennaku bbiri zokka eggwanga ligenda mu kulonda era ng’abooludda oluvuganya baluubirira okuwangula Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni, amaze emyaka 35 mu ntebe. Bw’abadde ayogerako eri bannamawulire, alina kkaadi ya FDC, Patrick Oboi Amuriat, ategeezezza nti omulimu omunene gusigalidde kakiiko ka byakulonda okulaba ng’okulonda kubeera kw’amazima kuba bo beegasse okwanika ebirumira ebinaakubeeramu. “Njagala okutegeeza akakiiko k’ebyokulonda nti bwe baba tebasobola kutegeka kalulu kalimu mazima n’obwenkanya, babeera tebalina mugaso ng’ekitongole.” Amuriat bw’agambye. Ate ye alina bbendera ya Alliance for National Transformation (ANT), Mugisha Muntu, agambye nti bo ng’abavuganya omulimu gwabwe bagukoze nga kati kiri eri bannayuganda okumaliriza ekkatala lino. Muntu agambye nti bannayuganda abawerako balaze nga bwe batagenda kulonda olw’emivuyo egibadde mu kunoonya akalulu. Wabula ono abasabye okuvaayo balonde, olutalo lusobole okuwangulwa. Ye Kyagulanyi Ssentamu nga yeesimbyewo ku kkaadi ya NUP, yennyamidde olw’okutulugunyizibwa ab’ebyokwerinda era nga bano baamutandikirawo nga yaakamala okwewandiisa. Bobi Wine annyonnyodde nti mu Uganda gwafuuka musango okuvuganya Pulezidenti Museveni. Kyagulanyi asabye bannayuganda okuvaayo okulonda mu bungi era bakuume akalulu kaabwe era baleme kugendera ku bigambo bya ssentebe w’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda,Simon Byabakama, eyabalagidde okudda eka. “ Temugendera ku bigambo bya Byabakama kubanga bimenya amateeka, temulina tteeka lyonna lye mubeera mumenye okusigala ku bifo awalonderwa okukuuma akalulu kammwe.” Bobi Wine bw’agambye. Ono asabye abantu okukozesa essimu zaabwe okukwata buvidiyo n’ebifaananyi singa balaba ebitagenda bulungi mu kalulu era beeyambise omutimbagano ku Uvote. Mu nsisinkano eno, eyavuganyako ku bwapulezidenti, Dr. Kiiza Besigye, yeewuunyizza ku butabanguko obubadde mu kkampeyini z’omulundi guno nga wadde yavuganyako emirundi egisoba mu ena, naye tabulabangako.

headline: Bobi Wine agamba eby’okukuza Muhoozi bamusembereza ntebe ya bwapulezidenti
text: Akulira ekibiina ki National Unity Platform (NUP), Robert Kyagulanyi (Bobi Wine) agamba ekya Museveni okukuza mutabani we Lt Gen Muhoozi Kainerugaba namutuusa ku ddaala lya Genero omujjuvu kigendereddwamu kumusembereza ntebe ya bwapulezidenti. Bino Kyagulanyi yabyogedde wakayita ssaawa busaawa nga Pulezidenti Museveni agobye mutabani we ku kifo ky’omudduumizi w’eggye ly’okuttaka wabula ate namukuza okufuuka Genero. Kainerugaba, Museveni yamusikizza Lt Gen Kayanja Muhanga. Bweyabadde ayogera ku nkyukakyuka zino, Kyagulanyi yagambye nti, “Oluvannyuma lw’okuteeka obubaka obw’ekiralu ku Twitter natiisatiisa Kenya ku Mmande, Pulezidenti Museveni asazeewo awe mutabani we ekirabo kya Genero. Ono mu bwangu agenda kuwummuzibwa akakatibwe ku bannansi nga Pulezidenti w’eggwanga, abo bonna abaagaliza Uganda ebirungi kino balina okukigaana.” Kyagulanyi agamba nti Museveni ne mutabani we bebali emabega w’okulinyirira eddembe ly’obuntu era nga bebasinga okukifunamu kuba Uganda baagala gitambuza nga bwebagala. Ono asabye amawanga g’abazungu okukomya okuteeka ssente mu gavumenti ya Museveni kuba tezigasa bannansi wabula gavumenti ezikozesa kubatulugunya nga kino kirina okukoma okutaasa ebiseera bya Uganda eby’omu maaso. Enkyukakyuka zino ezaakoleddwa zavudde ku Muhoozi okusinziira ku mutimbagano gwe ogwa Twitter nategeeza nti ye n’abajaasi be beetaaga wiiki 2 zokka nga bamaze okuwamba ekibuga ekikulu ekya Kenya ki Nairobi. Kino kyatabudde abantu abawerako era nga bangi basoose kulowooza nti waliwo abayingidde mu kibanja kye wabula oluvannyuma yakakasizza nti obubaka buno yeyabutaddeyo naye yabadde asaaga.

headline: Eby’okuwamba abantu mubiggyeemu eby’obufuzi, mubayimbule – Kkangaawo Mulondo
text: Bya Ssemakula Bulemeezi Omwami wa Ssaabasajja Kabaka atwala essaza Bulemeezi, Kkangaawo Ronald Mulondo, asabye gavumenti okuggya eby’obufuzi mu nsonga z’abantu abawambibwa wasobole okubaawo obwenkanya eri abantu bano. Abamu ku bakulembeze abeetabye mu nsisinkano eno Kkangaawo Mulondo ayagala abakwate basimbibwe mu kkooti eziragirwa mu mateeka mu kifo ky’okubakuumira mu bifo ebitamanyiddwa ekirinnyirira eddembe lyabwe. “Tetuwakanya muntu mumenyi w’amateeka kukwatibwa naye tugamba nti omuntu bwakwatibwa ng’alina etteeka ly’amenya, atwalibwe avunaanibwe mu kifo ekimanyiddwa obulungi era aweebwe ekibonerezo ng’amateeka bwegalagira.” Kkangaawo Mulondo bwe yasabye. Kkangaawo yagasseeko nti akadde katuuse bakolere wamu nga bannabulemeezi era babeeko ekintu eky’enkizo kye bamanyibwako, okusobola okutwala essaza lino mu maaso. Kkangaawo Ronald Mulondo Okusinziira ku Kkangaawo Mulondo, mu nsisinkano eno bakubaganyizza ebirowoozo ku by’obulamu, ebyenjigiriza n’ensonga endala zonna n’ekigendererwa ky’okukyusa embeera z’abantu ba Kabaka mu kitundu kino. Ono yabasabye okwegattira awamu awatali kusososola mu nzikiriza za byabufuzi, basobole okukyusa ekitundu kyabwe era bakkaatirize eddoboozi eryawamu. Bo abeetabye mu nsisinkano eno okuli; Omubaka Ssekabira Dennis owa Katikamu North n’owa Katikamu South Hassan Kirumira, bagambye nti ebikolobero bingi ebigenda maaso mu ggwanga nga byonna byetaaga okulwanyisibwa awatali kubiyingizaamu byabufuzi. Ate ye omubaka omulonde owa Nakaseke Central, Allan Mayanja Ssebunnya, yategeezezza nti ekiseera kino kyakusitula abantu b’e Bulemeezi abasembayo wansi awatali kusosola. Abakulembeze bano era baasiimye Kkangaawo olw’ensisinkano eno bwebatyo ne beeyama okutwala Bulemeezi ku ntikko.

headline: Abantu 500 bokka be bayitiddwa okuziika Ssaabasumba Lwanga
text: Kampala Enteekateeka z’okuziika Ssaabasumba wa Kampala, Dr. Cyprian Kiziito Lwanga nga zigenda mu maaso, Ekereziya Katolika evuddeyo n’etegeeza nti abantu 500 bokka be bagenda okukkirizibwa okuziika era nti bano baamaze dda n’okutegeezebwa ku nteekateeka eno. Ssaabasumba Lwanga agenda kuziikibwa nkya munda mu Ekereziya ya Lubaga wabula abakulu ba Ekereziya bategeezezza nti okusalawo ku muwendo gw’abantu kyakoleddwa okusobola okutangira ensaasaana ya Ssennyiga kolona.  “Tukimanyi nti buli muntu alina eddembe okukungubaga era tewali asaana kulimuggyako mu buli mbeera wabula waliwo abantu abalondeddwa Ekereziya n’aboobuyinza mu Gavumenti. Abo be bagenda okukiikirira ffe abalala  olw’okuba nti tuli mu biseera bya Ssenyiga Kolona.” Rev.Fr. Nicholas Mulumba omwogezi w’Obusumba bwa Kampala bw’ategeezezza. Rev.Fr Mulumba era ayongedde n’atangaaza ku nsonga eno nti tewali kya njawulo kyesigamiziddwako okulonda abantu abagenda okuziika okuggyako okuba nti bakulisitu ate nga beebo abalina akakwate akaamaanyi ku mugenzi. Ono yeegattidwako omwogezi wa poliisi mu Kampala n’emiriraano, Luke Oweyesigire, akkaatirizza nti bagenda kubeera bulindaala nnyo ku nsonga y’okutangira  ekirwadde kya Kolona okusaasaana era n’asaba abakungubazi okukakasa nti bambala obukookolo bwabwe. Ono era alabudde nti wagenda kubaawo okutataaganya eby’entambula naddala ku nguudo ezolekera Ekereziya ye Lubaga. Wano agambye nti abavuzi ba boodabooda tebagenda kukkirizibwa ku nguudo zino okuggyako nga balina ebipapula (stickers) ate nga nabo bagenda kulambikibwa enguudo ze banaakozesa.  Ssaabasumba Lwanga yasangibwa mu kisenge kye ng’afudde ku Lwomukaaga kumakya ng’entabwe yava ku kirwadde kya mutima. Ono yafiiridde ku myaka 68, wabula ng’abadde Ssaabasumba okumala emyaka 15.

headline: Abakulu mu poliisi bagenze ewa Bisoopu Kaggwa okumwetondera
text: Masaka Abanene mu poliisi beesitudde nebagenda ew’Omusumba w’essaza ly’e Masaka eyawummula, John Baptist Kaggwa, bamwetondere ku kikolwa kya basajja baayo okukuba ttiyaggaasi mu Mmisa wamu n’okulagira abaabadde bakung’aanye buli omu okulaba eryamuleese. Afande Kasingye ne Ttiimu ye nga beetongera Omusumba Kaggwa Ku bano kubaddeko akwanaganya poliisi n’ebyobufuzi, Asan Kasingye, akulira eby’okuketta mu poliisi, Ddamulira Christopher SSerunjogi, n’akulira eby’obutendekebwa Godfrey Ggoloba. Abapoliisi bamusanze mu maka ge ku ssaza e Kitovu era ng’ensisinkano eno yeetabiddwamu n’Omusumba wa Masaka aliko mu kiseera kino, Omusumba Serverus Jjumba. Kasingye asoose kwetonda ku ebyo ebyaliwo n’asaba abo bonna abategeka emikolo okusookanga okufuna olukkusa kubanga ekiseera kye tulimu kya Ssennyiga Corona. “Nze nga munnaddini nabasonyiwa dda kuba kiri mu nzikiriza yaffe okusonyiwa.” Omusumba Kaggwa bw’ategezezza nga yaakatandika okwogera. Omusumba Kaggwa agambye nti abapoliisi tebaawa bantu bali Mugulu kwennyonnyolako era ng’embeera y’obunkenke gyebaateekamu abantu yali teyeetaagisa era nga n’ebiragiro bya Ssennyiga Corona byali bikwatiddwa bulungi. Era Omusumba abasabye ab’ebyokwerinda okukolayo ekiwandiiko ekyetondera eggwanga lyonna olwebyo bye bakoze, kisobole okuzza emitima gy’abantu. Kasingye yeebazizza Omusumba Kaggwa olw’okubasonyiwa n’asuubizza nti bagenda kubagawo ekiwandiiko ekyetonda mu butongole eri bannansi era nga kino kkopi bajja kugiweerezaako akulira olukiiko lw’abasumba, Katikkiro wa Buganda wamu n’abeekika ky’Embogo. Ye ate Omusumba w’e Masaka, Bishop Serverus Jjumba, alaze obwennyamivu ku bikolwa bya poliisi era n’abasaba okweddako.

headline: Owek. Mayiga akuutidde abavubuka ku buyiiya n’obumalirivu
text: Kamalabyonna Charles Peter Mayiga akuutidde abavubuka wonna mu ggwanga okubeera abayiiya, abagumiikiriza, era abeesimbu bwebaba baagala okugenda mu maaso basobole okwekalakaanya. Entanda Katikkiro Mayiga agiwadde bw’abadde asisinkanye abavubuka abakulisitaayo okuva mu matendekero ag’enjawulo abeegattira mu kibiina ki National Christian Association. “Obulamu buli emijiji ena, ogusooka nga tuli mabujje, ogw’okubiri ogw’obuvubuka bwemulimu, Ogw’okusajjakula awamu n’obukadde. Naye omujiji ogusinga okubeera omukulu gwe gw’obuvubuka. Byokola ku myaka gino byebisalawo onaaba otya nga osajjakudde. Mulaba abantu abakulu nga babagamba nti yeeyisa nga omwana omuto ekitegeeza nti alina byatakola,” Owek. Mayiga. Abasabye okulemerako mwebyo byebakola basobole okugenda mu maaso mwebyo byebakola kibayambe okulaakulana. Owek. Mayiga abasabye okuwaayo obudde bweba baagala okulaba ku magoba geebyo byebatandiseewo awatali kufaayo ku kiseera era nabasaba babeere beetegefu okuyiga bulijjo okugatta kwebyo byebamanyi. Katikkiro Mayiga bano abagambye nti buli kyebakola tebalina kwerabira buwangwa bwabwe mwebasibuka kuba kijja kubeera kyangu okusobola okukola emirimu emirala.  Bano Ow’omumbuga abeebazizza olw’okunyweza obumu nga beegattira mu kibiina kyabwe era abawadde entanda esobola okubasomesa mu lugendo lwabwe olwobuvubuka. Ye Minisita avunaanyizibwa ku bavubuka, emizannyo n’okwewummuzaamu, Owek. Henry Kiberu Ssekabembe ategeezezza nti ekibiina kino kiri mu nkwatagana naba Buganda Youth Council era nabasaba okukola buli kimu n’obukugu okusobola okuvuganya mu nsi. Akulembeddemu abavubuka bano munnamateeka, Simon Ssenyonga agamba nti ekibiina kino kyatandikibwa mu mwaka gwa 2018 nekigendererwa kyakulaba ng’ abavubuka bwebamaliriza okusoma babaako kyebeekolera wakati nga tebanafuna mirimu.

headline: Eyali Ssaabalabirizi Ntagali awummuziddwa olw’ebyekuusa ku bwenzi
text: Kampala Eyali Ssaabalabirizi w’Ekkanisa ya Uganda, Stanely Ntagali, awummuziddwa ku bigambibwa nti yaganza omukazi omufumbo.  Okusinziira ku mukutu gwa Uganda Radio Network, kino kyalangiriddwa Ssaabalabirizi Kaziimba Mugalu mu bbaluwa eyafulumye nga January 13, 2021. Ebbaluwa eno erumiriza nti Ntagali aliko muka omusajja gw’abadde yaganza era nga’ensonga eno ne Ntagali akkiriza nti aliko ky’agimanyiko. “Obwenzi musango munene ku ddaala lyonna. Eyali Ssaabalabirizi Ntagali yalidde mu mukyala we, obufumbo bwe ne Yesu Kristo olukwe ne bannayuganda ababadde bamutunuulira ng’ekyokulabirako.” Ebbaluwa eri abeepisikoopi bwe yagambye. Kaziimba yagasseeko nti Ekkanisa ya Uganda erina abagoberezi abawera obukadde 13 era nga bano bonna bakemeddwa era ne bonoona naye nga Bbayibuli bw’egamba mu kitabo kya Abaroma 2:23, ekkanisa erina okuteeka abakulembeze baayo ku nninga baleme kuva ku mulamwa. Ono yannyonnyodde nti yamaze dda okutegeeza Ntagali ku nsonga eno era nga yayimiriziddwa okukola obuweereza bw’ekkanisa ku mutendera gwonna wadde okugaba amasakaremento oba okukiikirira ekkanisa. Kaziimba yasabye abakkiriza okusigala nga basabira abafumbo ku njuyi zombi basobole okwenenya era basonyiwagane. “Kano akadde si kakuzunza lugambo. Kadde ka kwetonda, kadde ka kusaba era n’okwekubamu ttooci era twenenye era akadde ak’okutereeza obufumbo bwaffe mu maaso ga Katonda,” Kaziimba bwe yagasseeko. Kaziimba agamba nti Ekkanisa tegenda kuttira muntu yenna ku liiso era nga baakunyweza ekirabo ky’obufumbo era nga bakkiriza nti obufumbo bwa kitiibwa era nga bulina kubaawo wakati w’omwami omu n’omukazi omu. “Tewali muntu ali waggulu w’amateeka ga Katonda. Tuyita abo bonna abamenye etteeka lino, mugende mu maaso ga Katonda mwenenye era musabe ekisonyiwo eri abo be musobezza.” Kaziimba bwe yagambye. Kinajjukirwa nti Ntagali, 65, ye Ssaabalabirizi w’Ekkanisa ya Uganda ey’omunaana era nga yawaayo yafeesi eri Stephen Kaziimba Mugalu nga 01/ 03/2020 oluvannyuma lw’okutuuka ku myaka egiwummula.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga asabye abasiraamu okunyweza obumu bwebalina ne Buganda
text: Katikkiro wa Buganda Charles Peter Mayiga asabye abasiraamu okunyweza enkolagana n’obumu bwebalina n’Obwakabaka bwa Buganda okusobola okuzza Buganda ku ntikko. Owek. Mayiga bino yabyogeredde ku mukolo Ssaabasajja Kabaka kwasiibulidde abasiraamu ogwayindidde mu bimuli bya Bulange ku Lwokutaano. “Ssaabasajja Kabaka yasiima okusiibulula abasiraamu nga ayagala tunyweze obumu n’okutabagana. Mukusiibulula abasiraamu Ssaabasajja Kabaka abeera atugamba nti baganda bammwe abo yonna gyebali mutuule nabo mu mwezi omutukuvu munyweze obwasseruganda,” Katikkiro Mayiga bwe yagambye.   Owek. Mayiga yasinzidde wano nategeeza nti abaami yonna gyebali balina okubeera abasaale okulwanyisa Siriimu kuba bebatandikiriza amakubo Mukenenya mwayita. Ate ye Supreme Mufti Sheik Muhammad Galabuzi yakubirizza abafumbo okwewala okusaabaana akawuka ka Mukenenya naye bafube okuba abeesigwa eri bannabwe kiyambako okulwanyisa akawuka Kano nga omulamwa gw’omwaka guno bweguvuga nti, ‘Abaami tubeere basaale mukulwanyisa Mukenenya.’   Omukolo guno gwetabiddwako Omumyuka Asooka owa Katikkiro Owek. Hajji Twaha Kawaase Kigongo, amyuka omukubiriza wolukiiko lwa Buganda Owek. Ahmed Lwasa, Owek. Hamis Kakomo, Owek. Hajjat Mariam Mayanja Nkalubo, Loodimmeeya Erias Lukwago, Mmeeya Ali Mulyanyama n’ abakulembeze abalala mu Buganda ne Uganda. Omukolo gw’okusiibulula abasiraamu gubeerawo buli mwaka n’ekigendererwa ky’okunyweza enkolagana wakati w’Obwakabaka n’abaddu ba Allah nga guvujjirirwa kampuni ya Airtel.

headline: Obwakabaka bukungubagidde Ssaabasumba Yonah Lwanga
text: Obwakabaka bwa Buganda bukungubagidde Ssaabasumba w’Abasodokisi mu ggwanga, Yonah Lwanga eyafiiridde mu ggwanga lya Buyonaani (Greece) ku Ssande. Katikkiro Mayiga bw’abadde ayogerako eri bannamawulire ku Mmande mu Bulange Mmengo, ategeezezza nti ono abadde ddoboozi ly’abo abanyigirizibwa era ayagala ennyo Kabaka we n’ensi ye Buganda. “Ssaabasumba Lwanga abadde omukulembeze w’eddiini asoosowaza obulungi bw’abantu. Abadde alwanirira eddembe ly’obuntu, enfuga entambulira ku mateeka, enkulaakulana n’okutabagana.” Owek. Mayiga bw’agambye. Owek. Mayiga agasseeko nga Ssaabasumba Lwanga bw’abadde musajja eyeeyagalira mu nnono n’obuwangwa bwa Buganda kyokka ate nga yeeyagalira bulungi mu nsi Uganda. Mu ngeri yeemu bannabyabufuzi batenderezza abadde Ssaabasumba w’Eklesia y’Abasodokisi mu Uganda, Yonah Lwanga ng’omusajja abadde omumalirivu era eddoboozi ly’abo abanyigirizibwa era ne basaba bannayuganda okumulabirako. Lwanga yafudde ku Ssande ku myaka 76 wabula ng’ebisingawo ku kyavuddeko okufa kwe tekinnategeerekeka. Ayavuganyaako ku bwapulezidenti, Dr. Kizza Besigye amwogeddeko ng’omusajja ateerya ntama era abadde omukulembeze omulungi akadde konna. Okusinziira ku Besigye, Lwanga abadde mumalirivu, eyekkiririzaamu era abadde akola ennyo okulaba nga Uganda ekulaakulana era bw’atyo n’ategeeza nti Uganda efiiriddwa nnyo. Ate Nnampala wa gavumenti, Thomas Tayebwa amwogeddeko ng’omusajja ow’amazima awaddeyo amaanyi ge gonna okuweereza abantu ba Katonda. Omuloodi Erias Lukwago amwogeddeko ng’omusajja awaniridde obwenkanya akadde ke konna. Lwanga yazaalibwa mu 1945 ng’enzikiriza y’Abasodokisi yaakamala okutongozebwa mu Uganda wadde nga yali ebaddewo okuva mu 1900.

headline: Batenderezza emirimu gya Ssaabasumba Yonah Lwanga
text: Abakungubazi okuva mu nsonda z’eggwanga ez’enjawulo bakedde ku Eklesia y’Omutukuvu Nicolas e Namung’oona, okwetaba mu kuziika abadde Ssaabasumba w’Abasodokisi Yonah Lwanga eyafa ku ntandikwa y’omwezi guno mu kibuga Athens ekya Buyonaani (Greece). Omukolo gw’okuziika Ssaabasumba Lwanga gwetabiddwakoabanene mu ggwanga nga bano bakulembeddwamuomumyuka w’omukukembeze w’eggwanga, Maj Gen. Jessica Aluponga y’akiikiridde Pulezidenti w’eggwanga, Katikkiro wa Buganda Charles Peter Mayiga, Katikkiro eyawummula Owek. Joseph Mulwanyammuli Ssemwogerere, akulira ekibiina kya NUP, Kyagulanyi Ssentamu Robert, akuuma entebe ya Ssaabasumbaw’essaza ekkulu erya Kampala, OmusumbaPaul Ssemwogerere, Ssaabalabirizi Steven Kaziimba Mugalu. Abalala kubaddeko; akulira olukiiko lw’abeepisikoopi Bishop Anthony Zziwa, akulira oludda oluwabula gavumenti,Owek. Mathias Mpuuga Nsamba,akulira ekibiina Kya ANT, Gen Mugisha Muntu,ababaka baPalamenti ne bannaddiini okuva mu nzikiriza ez’enjawulo. Kululwe, Katikkiro wa Buganda, CharlesPeter Mayiga atenderezza obuvumu Ssaabasumba YonahLwanga bw’abadde nabwo mu kulwanirira eddembe ly’obuntu. “Mu mirimu Ssaabasajja Kabaka gye yankwasa ntambudde bulungi ne Ssaabasumba Yonah Lwanga. Buli lwe wabaddewo ensonga yonna ng’ankubira essimu oba ng’ampandiikira.” Katikkiro Mayiga bw’agasseeko. Katikkiro Mayiga annyonnyodde nti omugenzi abadde ayogera ku bikyamu mu ddoboozi ery’omwanguka era abadde muntu ayagala ennyo abantu era ng’abalwanirira mu mbeera zonna era abadde omusajja omwesimbu n’asaba abalala okumulabirako. Eyakiikiridde Pulezidenti, Jessica Alupoatenderezza enkolagana ebaddewo wakati w’Ekelesia ne gavumentiera ne yeeyama okugitwala mu maaso. Akulira ekibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP),Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu BobiWine mukwogera kwe, ageraageranyizza Ssaabasumba Lwanga ku Ssaabalabirizi Janan Luwumu olwobutekkiriranya; ng’ebikyamu ebikolebwa ku bantu abadde avaayo n’abyogerako kkaati era ono ebigambo bye tebyawukanye n’ebyakulira oludda oluvuganya gavumenti mu Palamenti, Mathias Mpuuga Nsamba. Mu ngeri y’emu, Kyagulanyi asabye abantu okwefumiitiriza ku mukululo Ssaabasumba Lwanga gw’alese. Ssaabasumba Lwanga aziikiddwa mu bitiibwa by’eggwanga ebijjuvuku ssaawa 9 ez’olweggulo era akubiddwa emizinga esatu okusiima emirimu gy’akoledde eggwanga.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga alambudde ku Mutiibwa Kalidinaali Wamala
text: Katikkiro wa Buganda, Charles Peter Mayiga alambudde ku Kalidinaali Emmanuel Wamalaera n’abaako n’obubaka bwa Ssaabasajja Kabaka bw’atuusa olw’okufiirwa muto we, Msgr. Henry Kyabukasa. Ensisinkano eno ebaddewo leero ku Mmande mu maka ga Kalidinaali e Nsambya mu Kampala. “Ssebo Omutiibwa Kalidinaali, nsanyuse nnyo okujjako wano mu maka go era Ssaabasajja Kabaka atumye nnyo okukulaba era akusaasidde olw’okufiirwa muto wo Msgr. Henry Kyabukasa era n’antuma okutegeeza nti asiima nnyo essaala z’omuweereza era akakasiza ddala nti zimuyambye.” Katikkiro Mayiga bw’ategeezezza Ku lulwe Katikkiro Mayiga ategeezezza nti muto wa Kalidinaali Byabukasa yali amumanyi okuva mu buto kuba yakola ne kitaawe Fr. John Musoke nga batendeka abaseminariyo e Bukalasa ate ng’abamu ku abo batendese abadde nabo emyaka mingi. Katikkiro Mayiga agamba nti Msgr. Kyabukasa yali mwetowaze olw’okuba yali mugezi era ng’akimanyi ntimuto wa Kalidinaali. Okusinziira ku Katikkiro Mayiga, kyamukisa okuba nti Katonda abawadde ekirabo eky’okulaba Kalidinaali ebbanga lino lyonna naddala abo abamulabako ng’akyali Ffaaza era kibeera kyasanyu buli lwe bamusisinkana. Mu ngeri y’Obuwangwa, Katikkiro Mayiga mu kukubagiza kuno agenze n’ekita ky’omwenge okwongera okulaga okunyolwa. Ye Omutiibwa Kalidinaali Emmanuel Wamala asiimye Katikkiro Mayiga olw’okumulambula era n’amusiima olw’emirimu gy’akola okusitula embeera z’abantu mu Buganda. “Onsanyudde kubanga obugenyi bwo buno buziguliddewo ebijjukizo ebyo. Ssebo Kamalabyonna wa Buganda n’obuwombeefu bunginkusaba onamusize Bbaffe Ssaabasajja Kabaka ne maama Nnaabagereka, abaana beng’oma, Abalangira n’Abambejja n’Obuganda bwonna.” Ssaabasumba omuwummuze ow’essaza ekkulu ery’e Kampala bw’ategeezezezza.

headline: Ssaabasumba Lwanga waakuziikibwa munda mu Lutikko e Lubaga
text: Kampala Akulira essaza Ekkulu ery’e Kampala mu kiseera kino, Msgr . Charles Kasibante, akakasizza nti Ssaabasumba Dr. Cyprian Kizito Lwanga  agenda kuziikibwa mu Lutikko e Lubaga. Dr. Lwanga y’agenda okubeera Bisoopu owookusatu okuziikibwa mu Lutikko eno. Eyasooka yali Bisoopu  Edouard Michaud, ono yali munnansi wa  Canada era yali omu ku baminsane Ba-White Fathers’ era ye yali Vicar w’Eklezia ya Uganda okuva mu 1933 okutuuka mu 1945 we yafiira. Munda mu Lutikko eno mwe muli n’ebisigalira bya Bisoopu Joseph Kiwanuka eyali omuddugavu eyasooka okufuna ekitiibwa kya Bisoopu era ono yafa mu 1966 nga waakayita emyaka 5 oluvannyuma lw’okufuuka Ssaabasumba w’essaza ly’e Rubaga nga bwe lyali liyitibwa mu kiseera ekyo. Okusinziira  ku Msgr. Kasibante, ababiri bano baaziikibwa ku ludda olwa ddyo olw’Eklezia emabega w’ekifo Kkwaya w’eyimbira. Kasibante agamba nti ku Lwokuna, Ssaabasumba Lwanga agenda kuziikibwa mu makkati g’abakulu bano ababiri abaasooka okuziikibwayo. Eyali Vicar Genero, Gerald Kalumba annyonnyodde nti yafuuka mpisa okuziika ba Ssaabasumba  mu Lutikko gye bali baweerereza. Ono agambye nti naye kino olumu kisinziira kuba singa Ssaabasumba yenna abaako ekiraamo ky’alese nga kiraga w’ayagala okuziikibwa olwo ekiraamo kye kissibwamu ekitiibwa. Msgr. Kalumba awadde eky’okulabirako kya Kalidinaali Emmanuel Nsubuga eyaleka ekiraamo ng’asaba bamuziike mu maka ga bakateyamba ge yali atandiseewo. Okusinziira ku bimanyiddwa mu Eklezia, Lutikko ez’enjawulo zirina ebifo ebyenjawulo ebyateekebwamu okuziikamu ba Ssaabasumba. Ennono eno yatandikira mu biseera abasomi mwe baali bayiganyizibwa era nga bangi mu budde obwa baaziikibwa mu mpuku gye baali beekukumye era ennono eno n’abaliwo kati bakyagitwala mu maaso. Singa ekifo ekiziikibwamu abakulu bano kijjula, abakulira Lutikko basobole okufuna ekifo ekirala we babaziika naye era nga bagoberera akalombolombo ke kamu. Eky’okulabirako ekirungi, e Masaka ba Bisoopu babiri baaziikibwa munda mu Lutikko y’e Villa Maria eyasooka okuzimbibwa nga tennakyusibwa kuzzibwa Kitovu. Naye Bisoopu Kaggwa bwe yafa emabegako nga tewali we bayinza muziika, bwebatyo ne basalawo okumuzimba mu kkanisa esangibwa mu limbo ya Seminale y’e Bukalasa. Okusinziira ku lupapula lwa Observe, Cansala w’e Masak, Rev. Fr. Edward Ssekabanja, yagamba nti Eklezia eno  baagiteekawo okuziikamu Babisoopu b’e Masaka awamu ne Babisoopu abalala abatali mu Masaka naye nga badyagadde okuziikibwa mu kitundu kino.

headline: Enteekateeka z’olunaku lw’abajulizi zifulumye, Masaka yeetegeka
text: Enteekateeka z’okujjukira olunaku lw’abajulizi zifulumye era nga Masaka yeddiziddwa omukisa okuddamu okutegeka okulamaga kw’omulundi guno oluvannyuma lw’emikolo gino obutabeerayo omwaka oguwedde olwa Ssennyiga Corona. Kino kyabikkuddwa Omusumba w’essaza ly’Eklezia erya Masaka mu lukung’aana lwa bannamawulire lwe yatuuzizza e Kitovu, n’asaba abakkiriza okusabira ewaka ku ttivvi n’emitimbagano okusobola okwewala omujjuzo oguyinza okuvaako ekirwadde kya Corona okweyongera. Mu mwaka gwa 2020, essaza ly’e Masaka lye lyali eryokutegeka emikolo gino era nga kaweefube w’okukung’aanya ensimbi zino yali atandikiddwako. Okulamaga kuno okunaabeerawo nga 3 June omwaka guno okutandika ssaawa ssatu ez’okumakya, abateesiteesi balambuludde ku nteekateeka nga bw’eneebeera ng’abantu wajja kukkirizibwayo bayite bokka. Okusinziira ku musumba Jjumba, abalamazi abava ebweru w’eggwanga n’abo abalamaza ebigere okuva wano mu ggwanga, nabo sibaakukkirizibwa. Omusumba Jjumba alambuludde nti omulundi guno bajja kusinga okusabira emirembe mu ggwanga, okunyweza abakristu wamu n’okuwegayirira ensi esobola okuzuula eddagala lya Ssennyiga Corona. Ku ky’abalamazi ababadde bafuna amazzi g’omukisa e Namugongo, Omusumba abasabye bafune amazzi bagatwalire abasasorodooti baabwe, bagawe omukisa eyo mu bigo byabwe kuba ku lunaku lwennyini abantu tebajja kukkirizibwa kunona mazzi gano. Omuwanika w’enteekateeka eno, Rev. Fr. Anselm Edward Ssemwogerere, yategeezezza nti ku mulundi guno beetaaga obukadde bw’ensimbi 250 okutegeka okulamaga kuno nga ku zino balinako obukadde 151 zokka. Asabye abantu okudduukirira omulimu guno. Kino kitegeeza nti beetagayo obukadde 99 wabula era okwawukanako n’okusolooza ssente okubadde kujja kubeerawo ng’abantu basonda mu kikungo, zino ezibulayo bakunze ebitongole okubakwasizaako. Eyakulembeddemu enteekateeka eno, Fr.George William Lubega, yannyonnyodde nti enkola eno abaviiriddeko okusubwa ebintu bingi omuli n’okutongoza olunaku lw’okulamaga olw’abaana abato nga be baali bagenda okukitandika nga n’amasaza amalala gaali gaakulabira okwo.

headline: Obwakabaka bulonze olukiiko olugenda okwekenneenya amateeka g’omupiira gw’amasaza
text: Obwakabaka bwa Buganda, nga buyita mu minisitule y’abavubuka, ebyemizaanyo n’okwewummuza, bulonze olukiiko lw’abantu 8, okukola ennongoosereza mu mateeka agagenda okuddukanya empaka z’amasaza. Olukiiko olulondeddwa lukulirwa Bainamani Bernard, Omuwandiisi Festus Kirumira ate bammemba kuliko; Frank Kyazze, Haruna Kyobe, Ruth Nalwanga, Mwanje Dan, Richard Kirabira ne Simon Nsubuga “Tubasuubira okutuggyirayo amateeka agasobola okutuyamba okuzimba empaka zino nga mu kino balina okulaba nga ttiimu y’essaza esobola okweyimirizaawo, okufuba okulaba nti wabeerawo obwerufu mu kukung’aanya ensimbi n’okuzisaasaanya n’empuliziganya ku nsonga y’ensimbi.
